146  inline cInt Round(double val)
147  {
148  if ((val < 0))
149  return static_cast<cInt>(val - 0.5);
150  else
151  return static_cast<cInt>(val + 0.5);
152  }

154 
155  inline cInt Abs(cInt val)
156  {
157  return val < 0 ? -val : val;

164  void PolyTree::Clear()
165  {
166  for (PolyNodes::size_type i = 0; i < AllNodes.size(); ++i)
167  delete AllNodes[i];
168  AllNodes.resize(0);
169  Childs.resize(0);
170  }
171 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
172 
173  PolyNode *PolyTree::GetFirst() const
174  {
175  if (!Childs.empty())
176  return Childs[0];
177  else
178  return 0;
179  }
180 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
181 
182  int PolyTree::Total() const
183  {
184  int result = (int) AllNodes.size();
185  //with negative offsets, ignore the hidden outer polygon ...
186  if (result > 0 && Childs[0] != AllNodes[0])
187  result--;
188  return result;
189  }

215  PolyNode *PolyNode::GetNext() const
216  {
217  if (!Childs.empty())
218  return Childs[0];
219  else
220  return GetNextSiblingUp();
221  }
222 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
223 
224  PolyNode *PolyNode::GetNextSiblingUp() const
225  {
226  if (!Parent) //protects against PolyTree.GetNextSiblingUp()
227  return 0;
228  else if (Index == Parent->Childs.size() - 1)
229  return Parent->GetNextSiblingUp();
230  else
231  return Parent->Childs[Index + 1];
232  }

235  bool PolyNode::IsHole() const
236  {
237  bool result = true;
238  PolyNode *node = Parent;
239  while (node)
240  {
241  result = !result;
242  node = node->Parent;
243  }
244  return result;
245  }

256 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
257 // Int128 class (enables safe math on signed 64bit integers)
258 // eg Int128 val1((long64)9223372036854775807); //ie 2^63 -1
259 // Int128 val2((long64)9223372036854775807);
260 // Int128 val3 = val1 * val2;
261 // val3.AsString => "85070591730234615847396907784232501249" (8.5e+37)
262 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
263 
264  class Int128
265  {
266  public:
267  ulong64 lo;
268  long64 hi;
269 
270  Int128(long64 _lo = 0)
271  {
272  lo = (ulong64) _lo;
273  if (_lo < 0)
274  hi = -1;
275  else
276  hi = 0;
277  }
278 
279 
280  Int128(const Int128 &val) : lo(val.lo), hi(val.hi)
281  {
282  }
283 
284  Int128(const long64 &_hi, const ulong64 &_lo) : lo(_lo), hi(_hi)
285  {
286  }
287 
288  Int128 &operator=(const long64 &val)
289  {
290  lo = (ulong64) val;
291  if (val < 0)
292  hi = -1;
293  else
294  hi = 0;
295  return *this;
296  }
297 
298  bool operator==(const Int128 &val) const
299  {
300  return (hi == val.hi && lo == val.lo);
301  }
302 
303  bool operator!=(const Int128 &val) const
304  {
305  return !(*this == val);
306  }
307 
308  bool operator>(const Int128 &val) const
309  {
310  if (hi != val.hi)
311  return hi > val.hi;
312  else
313  return lo > val.lo;
314  }
315 
316  bool operator<(const Int128 &val) const
317  {
318  if (hi != val.hi)
319  return hi < val.hi;
320  else
321  return lo < val.lo;
322  }
323 
324  bool operator>=(const Int128 &val) const
325  {
326  return !(*this < val);
327  }
328 
329  bool operator<=(const Int128 &val) const
330  {
331  return !(*this > val);
332  }
333 
334  Int128 &operator+=(const Int128 &rhs)
335  {
336  hi += rhs.hi;
337  lo += rhs.lo;
338  if (lo < rhs.lo)
339  hi++;
340  return *this;
341  }
342 
343  Int128 operator+(const Int128 &rhs) const
344  {
345  Int128 result(*this);
346  result += rhs;
347  return result;
348  }
349 
350  Int128 &operator-=(const Int128 &rhs)
351  {
352  *this += -rhs;
353  return *this;
354  }
355 
356  Int128 operator-(const Int128 &rhs) const
357  {
358  Int128 result(*this);
359  result -= rhs;
360  return result;
361  }
362 
363  Int128 operator-() const //unary negation
364  {
365  if (lo == 0)
366  return Int128(-hi, 0);
367  else
368  return Int128(~hi, ~lo + 1);
369  }
370 
371  operator double() const
372  {
373  const double shift64 = 18446744073709551616.0; //2^64
374  if (hi < 0)
375  {
376  if (lo == 0)
377  return (double) hi * shift64;
378  else
379  return -(double) (~lo + ~hi * shift64);
380  } else
381  return (double) (lo + hi * shift64);
382  }
383 
384  };
385 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
386 
387  Int128 Int128Mul(long64 lhs, long64 rhs)
388  {
389  bool negate = (lhs < 0) != (rhs < 0);
390 
391  if (lhs < 0)
392  lhs = -lhs;
393  ulong64 int1Hi = ulong64(lhs) >> 32;
394  ulong64 int1Lo = ulong64(lhs & 0xFFFFFFFF);
395 
396  if (rhs < 0)
397  rhs = -rhs;
398  ulong64 int2Hi = ulong64(rhs) >> 32;
399  ulong64 int2Lo = ulong64(rhs & 0xFFFFFFFF);
400 
401  //nb: see comments in clipper.pas
402  ulong64 a = int1Hi * int2Hi;
403  ulong64 b = int1Lo * int2Lo;
404  ulong64 c = int1Hi * int2Lo + int1Lo * int2Hi;
405 
406  Int128 tmp;
407  tmp.hi = long64(a + (c >> 32));
408  tmp.lo = long64(c << 32);
409  tmp.lo += long64(b);
410  if (tmp.lo < b)
411  tmp.hi++;
412  if (negate)
413  tmp = -tmp;
414  return tmp;
415  };
416 #endif

422  bool Orientation(const Path &poly)
423  {
424  return Area(poly) >= 0;
425  }
426 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
427 
428  double Area(const Path &poly)
429  {
430  int size = (int) poly.size();
431  if (size < 3)
432  return 0;
433 
434  double a = 0;
435  for (int i = 0, j = size - 1; i < size; ++i)
436  {
437  a += ((double) poly[j].X + poly[i].X) * ((double) poly[j].Y - poly[i].Y);
438  j = i;
439  }
440  return -a * 0.5;
441  }
442 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
443 
444  double Area(const OutPt *op)
445  {
446  const OutPt *startOp = op;
447  if (!op)
448  return 0;
449  double a = 0;
450  do
451  {
452  a += (double) (op->Prev->Pt.X + op->Pt.X) * (double) (op->Prev->Pt.Y - op->Pt.Y);
453  op = op->Next;
454  } while (op != startOp);
455  return a * 0.5;
456  }
457 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
458 
459  double Area(const OutRec &outRec)
460  {
461  return Area(outRec.Pts);
462  }

465  bool PointIsVertex(const IntPoint &Pt, OutPt *pp)
466  {
467  OutPt *pp2 = pp;
468  do
469  {
470  if (pp2->Pt == Pt)
471  return true;
472  pp2 = pp2->Next;
473  } while (pp2 != pp);
474  return false;
475  }
476 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
477 
478 //See "The Point in Polygon Problem for Arbitrary Polygons" by Hormann & Agathos
479 //http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download?doi=10.1.1.88.5498&rep=rep1&type=pdf
480  int PointInPolygon(const IntPoint &pt, const Path &path)
481  {
482  //returns 0 if false, +1 if true, -1 if pt ON polygon boundary
483  int result = 0;
484  size_t cnt = path.size();
485  if (cnt < 3)
486  return 0;
487  IntPoint ip = path[0];
488  for (size_t i = 1; i <= cnt; ++i)
489  {
490  IntPoint ipNext = (i == cnt ? path[0] : path[i]);
491  if (ipNext.Y == pt.Y)
492  {
493  if ((ipNext.X == pt.X) || (ip.Y == pt.Y &&
494  ((ipNext.X > pt.X) == (ip.X < pt.X))))
495  return -1;
496  }
497  if ((ip.Y < pt.Y) != (ipNext.Y < pt.Y))
498  {
499  if (ip.X >= pt.X)
500  {
501  if (ipNext.X > pt.X)
502  result = 1 - result;
503  else
504  {
505  double d = (double) (ip.X - pt.X) * (ipNext.Y - pt.Y) -
506  (double) (ipNext.X - pt.X) * (ip.Y - pt.Y);
507  if (!d)
508  return -1;
509  if ((d > 0) == (ipNext.Y > ip.Y))
510  result = 1 - result;
511  }
512  } else
513  {
514  if (ipNext.X > pt.X)
515  {
516  double d = (double) (ip.X - pt.X) * (ipNext.Y - pt.Y) -
517  (double) (ipNext.X - pt.X) * (ip.Y - pt.Y);
518  if (!d)
519  return -1;
520  if ((d > 0) == (ipNext.Y > ip.Y))
521  result = 1 - result;
522  }
523  }
524  }
525  ip = ipNext;
526  }
527  return result;
528  }
529 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
530 
531  int PointInPolygon(const IntPoint &pt, OutPt *op)
532  {
533  //returns 0 if false, +1 if true, -1 if pt ON polygon boundary
534  int result = 0;
535  OutPt *startOp = op;
536  for (;;)
537  {
538  if (op->Next->Pt.Y == pt.Y)
539  {
540  if ((op->Next->Pt.X == pt.X) || (op->Pt.Y == pt.Y &&
541  ((op->Next->Pt.X > pt.X) == (op->Pt.X < pt.X))))
542  return -1;
543  }
544  if ((op->Pt.Y < pt.Y) != (op->Next->Pt.Y < pt.Y))
545  {
546  if (op->Pt.X >= pt.X)
547  {
548  if (op->Next->Pt.X > pt.X)
549  result = 1 - result;
550  else
551  {
552  double d = (double) (op->Pt.X - pt.X) * (op->Next->Pt.Y - pt.Y) -
553  (double) (op->Next->Pt.X - pt.X) * (op->Pt.Y - pt.Y);
554  if (!d)
555  return -1;
556  if ((d > 0) == (op->Next->Pt.Y > op->Pt.Y))
557  result = 1 - result;
558  }
559  } else
560  {
561  if (op->Next->Pt.X > pt.X)
562  {
563  double d = (double) (op->Pt.X - pt.X) * (op->Next->Pt.Y - pt.Y) -
564  (double) (op->Next->Pt.X - pt.X) * (op->Pt.Y - pt.Y);
565  if (!d)
566  return -1;
567  if ((d > 0) == (op->Next->Pt.Y > op->Pt.Y))
568  result = 1 - result;
569  }
570  }
571  }
572  op = op->Next;
573  if (startOp == op)
574  break;
575  }
576  return result;
577  }
578 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
579 
580  bool Poly2ContainsPoly1(OutPt *OutPt1, OutPt *OutPt2)
581  {
582  OutPt *op = OutPt1;
583  do
584  {
585  //nb: PointInPolygon returns 0 if false, +1 if true, -1 if pt on polygon
586  int res = PointInPolygon(op->Pt, OutPt2);
587  if (res >= 0)
588  return res > 0;
589  op = op->Next;
590  } while (op != OutPt1);
591  return true;
592  }

594 
595  bool SlopesEqual(const TEdge &e1, const TEdge &e2, bool UseFullInt64Range)
596  {
597 #ifndef use_int32
598  if (UseFullInt64Range)
599  return Int128Mul(e1.Top.Y - e1.Bot.Y, e2.Top.X - e2.Bot.X) ==
600  Int128Mul(e1.Top.X - e1.Bot.X, e2.Top.Y - e2.Bot.Y);
601  else
602 #endif
603  return (e1.Top.Y - e1.Bot.Y) * (e2.Top.X - e2.Bot.X) ==
604  (e1.Top.X - e1.Bot.X) * (e2.Top.Y - e2.Bot.Y);
605  }
606 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
607 
608  bool SlopesEqual(const IntPoint pt1, const IntPoint pt2,
609  const IntPoint pt3, bool UseFullInt64Range)
610  {
611 #ifndef use_int32
612  if (UseFullInt64Range)
613  return Int128Mul(pt1.Y - pt2.Y, pt2.X - pt3.X) == Int128Mul(pt1.X - pt2.X, pt2.Y - pt3.Y);
614  else
615 #endif
616  return (pt1.Y - pt2.Y) * (pt2.X - pt3.X) == (pt1.X - pt2.X) * (pt2.Y - pt3.Y);
617  }
618 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
619 
620  bool SlopesEqual(const IntPoint pt1, const IntPoint pt2,
621  const IntPoint pt3, const IntPoint pt4, bool UseFullInt64Range)
622  {
623 #ifndef use_int32
624  if (UseFullInt64Range)
625  return Int128Mul(pt1.Y - pt2.Y, pt3.X - pt4.X) == Int128Mul(pt1.X - pt2.X, pt3.Y - pt4.Y);
626  else
627 #endif
628  return (pt1.Y - pt2.Y) * (pt3.X - pt4.X) == (pt1.X - pt2.X) * (pt3.Y - pt4.Y);
629  }

632  inline bool IsHorizontal(TEdge &e)
633  {
634  return e.Dx == HORIZONTAL;
635  }
636 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
637 
638  inline double GetDx(const IntPoint pt1, const IntPoint pt2)
639  {
640  return (pt1.Y == pt2.Y) ?
641  HORIZONTAL : (double) (pt2.X - pt1.X) / (pt2.Y - pt1.Y);
642  }
643 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
644 
645  inline void SetDx(TEdge &e)
646  {
647  cInt dy = (e.Top.Y - e.Bot.Y);
648  if (dy == 0)
649  e.Dx = HORIZONTAL;
650  else
651  e.Dx = (double) (e.Top.X - e.Bot.X) / dy;
652  }

656  {
657  EdgeSide Side = Edge1.Side;
658  Edge1.Side = Edge2.Side;
659  Edge2.Side = Side;
660  }

663  inline void SwapPolyIndexes(TEdge &Edge1, TEdge &Edge2)
664  {
665  int OutIdx = Edge1.OutIdx;
666  Edge1.OutIdx = Edge2.OutIdx;
667  Edge2.OutIdx = OutIdx;
668  }
669 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
670 
671  inline cInt TopX(TEdge &edge, const cInt currentY)
672  {
673  return (currentY == edge.Top.Y) ?
674  edge.Top.X : edge.Bot.X + Round(edge.Dx * (currentY - edge.Bot.Y));
675  }
676 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
677 
678  void IntersectPoint(TEdge &Edge1, TEdge &Edge2, IntPoint &ip)
679  {
680 #ifdef use_xyz
681  ip.Z = 0;
682 #endif
683 
684  double b1, b2;
685  if (Edge1.Dx == Edge2.Dx)
686  {
687  ip.Y = Edge1.Curr.Y;
688  ip.X = TopX(Edge1, ip.Y);
689  return;
690  } else if (Edge1.Dx == 0)
691  {
692  ip.X = Edge1.Bot.X;
693  if (IsHorizontal(Edge2))
694  ip.Y = Edge2.Bot.Y;
695  else
696  {
697  b2 = Edge2.Bot.Y - (Edge2.Bot.X / Edge2.Dx);
698  ip.Y = Round(ip.X / Edge2.Dx + b2);
699  }
700  } else if (Edge2.Dx == 0)
701  {
702  ip.X = Edge2.Bot.X;
703  if (IsHorizontal(Edge1))
704  ip.Y = Edge1.Bot.Y;
705  else
706  {
707  b1 = Edge1.Bot.Y - (Edge1.Bot.X / Edge1.Dx);
708  ip.Y = Round(ip.X / Edge1.Dx + b1);
709  }
710  } else
711  {
712  b1 = Edge1.Bot.X - Edge1.Bot.Y * Edge1.Dx;
713  b2 = Edge2.Bot.X - Edge2.Bot.Y * Edge2.Dx;
714  double q = (b2 - b1) / (Edge1.Dx - Edge2.Dx);
715  ip.Y = Round(q);
716  if (std::fabs(Edge1.Dx) < std::fabs(Edge2.Dx))
717  ip.X = Round(Edge1.Dx * q + b1);
718  else
719  ip.X = Round(Edge2.Dx * q + b2);
720  }
721 
722  if (ip.Y < Edge1.Top.Y || ip.Y < Edge2.Top.Y)
723  {
724  if (Edge1.Top.Y > Edge2.Top.Y)
725  ip.Y = Edge1.Top.Y;
726  else
727  ip.Y = Edge2.Top.Y;
728  if (std::fabs(Edge1.Dx) < std::fabs(Edge2.Dx))
729  ip.X = TopX(Edge1, ip.Y);
730  else
731  ip.X = TopX(Edge2, ip.Y);
732  }
733  //finally, don't allow 'ip' to be BELOW curr.Y (ie bottom of scanbeam) ...
734  if (ip.Y > Edge1.Curr.Y)
735  {
736  ip.Y = Edge1.Curr.Y;
737  //use the more vertical edge to derive X ...
738  if (std::fabs(Edge1.Dx) > std::fabs(Edge2.Dx))
739  ip.X = TopX(Edge2, ip.Y);
740  else
741  ip.X = TopX(Edge1, ip.Y);
742  }
743  }
744 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
745 
746  void ReversePolyPtLinks(OutPt *pp)
747  {
748  if (!pp)
749  return;
750  OutPt *pp1, *pp2;
751  pp1 = pp;
752  do
753  {
754  pp2 = pp1->Next;
755  pp1->Next = pp1->Prev;
756  pp1->Prev = pp2;
757  pp1 = pp2;
758  } while (pp1 != pp);
759  }
760 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
761 
762  void DisposeOutPts(OutPt *&pp)
763  {
764  if (pp == 0)
765  return;
766  pp->Prev->Next = 0;
767  while (pp)
768  {
769  OutPt *tmpPp = pp;
770  pp = pp->Next;
771  delete tmpPp;
772  }
773  }
774 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
775 
776  inline void InitEdge(TEdge *e, TEdge *eNext, TEdge *ePrev, const IntPoint &Pt)
777  {
778  std::memset(e, 0, sizeof(TEdge));
779  e->Next = eNext;
780  e->Prev = ePrev;
781  e->Curr = Pt;
782  e->OutIdx = Unassigned;
783  }
784 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
785 
786  void InitEdge2(TEdge &e, PolyType Pt)
787  {
788  if (e.Curr.Y >= e.Next->Curr.Y)
789  {
790  e.Bot = e.Curr;
791  e.Top = e.Next->Curr;
792  } else
793  {
794  e.Top = e.Curr;
795  e.Bot = e.Next->Curr;
796  }
797  SetDx(e);
798  e.PolyTyp = Pt;
799  }
800 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
801 
802  TEdge *RemoveEdge(TEdge *e)
803  {
804  //removes e from double_linked_list (but without removing from memory)
805  e->Prev->Next = e->Next;
806  e->Next->Prev = e->Prev;
807  TEdge *result = e->Next;
808  e->Prev = 0; //flag as removed (see ClipperBase.Clear)
809  return result;
810  }
811 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
812 
813  inline void ReverseHorizontal(TEdge &e)
814  {
815  //swap horizontal edges' Top and Bottom x's so they follow the natural
816  //progression of the bounds - ie so their xbots will align with the
817  //adjoining lower edge. [Helpful in the ProcessHorizontal() method.]
818  std::swap(e.Top.X, e.Bot.X);
819 #ifdef use_xyz
820  std::swap(e.Top.Z, e.Bot.Z);
821 #endif
822  }
823 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
824 
825  void SwapPoints(IntPoint &pt1, IntPoint &pt2)
826  {
827  IntPoint tmp = pt1;
828  pt1 = pt2;
829  pt2 = tmp;
830  }
831 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
832 
833  bool GetOverlapSegment(IntPoint pt1a, IntPoint pt1b, IntPoint pt2a,
834  IntPoint pt2b, IntPoint &pt1, IntPoint &pt2)
835  {
836  //precondition: segments are Collinear.
837  if (Abs(pt1a.X - pt1b.X) > Abs(pt1a.Y - pt1b.Y))
838  {
839  if (pt1a.X > pt1b.X)
840  SwapPoints(pt1a, pt1b);
841  if (pt2a.X > pt2b.X)
842  SwapPoints(pt2a, pt2b);
843  if (pt1a.X > pt2a.X)
844  pt1 = pt1a;
845  else
846  pt1 = pt2a;
847  if (pt1b.X < pt2b.X)
848  pt2 = pt1b;
849  else
850  pt2 = pt2b;
851  return pt1.X < pt2.X;
852  } else
853  {
854  if (pt1a.Y < pt1b.Y)
855  SwapPoints(pt1a, pt1b);
856  if (pt2a.Y < pt2b.Y)
857  SwapPoints(pt2a, pt2b);
858  if (pt1a.Y < pt2a.Y)
859  pt1 = pt1a;
860  else
861  pt1 = pt2a;
862  if (pt1b.Y > pt2b.Y)
863  pt2 = pt1b;
864  else
865  pt2 = pt2b;
866  return pt1.Y > pt2.Y;
867  }
868  }
869 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
870 
871  bool FirstIsBottomPt(const OutPt *btmPt1, const OutPt *btmPt2)
872  {
873  OutPt *p = btmPt1->Prev;
874  while ((p->Pt == btmPt1->Pt) && (p != btmPt1))
875  p = p->Prev;
876  double dx1p = std::fabs(GetDx(btmPt1->Pt, p->Pt));
877  p = btmPt1->Next;
878  while ((p->Pt == btmPt1->Pt) && (p != btmPt1))
879  p = p->Next;
880  double dx1n = std::fabs(GetDx(btmPt1->Pt, p->Pt));
881 
882  p = btmPt2->Prev;
883  while ((p->Pt == btmPt2->Pt) && (p != btmPt2))
884  p = p->Prev;
885  double dx2p = std::fabs(GetDx(btmPt2->Pt, p->Pt));
886  p = btmPt2->Next;
887  while ((p->Pt == btmPt2->Pt) && (p != btmPt2))
888  p = p->Next;
889  double dx2n = std::fabs(GetDx(btmPt2->Pt, p->Pt));
890 
891  if (std::max(dx1p, dx1n) == std::max(dx2p, dx2n) &&
892  std::min(dx1p, dx1n) == std::min(dx2p, dx2n))
893  return Area(btmPt1) > 0; //if otherwise identical use orientation
894  else
895  return (dx1p >= dx2p && dx1p >= dx2n) || (dx1n >= dx2p && dx1n >= dx2n);
896  }
897 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
898 
899  OutPt *GetBottomPt(OutPt *pp)
900  {
901  OutPt *dups = 0;
902  OutPt *p = pp->Next;
903  while (p != pp)
904  {
905  if (p->Pt.Y > pp->Pt.Y)
906  {
907  pp = p;
908  dups = 0;
909  } else if (p->Pt.Y == pp->Pt.Y && p->Pt.X <= pp->Pt.X)
910  {
911  if (p->Pt.X < pp->Pt.X)
912  {
913  dups = 0;
914  pp = p;
915  } else
916  {
917  if (p->Next != pp && p->Prev != pp)
918  dups = p;
919  }
920  }
921  p = p->Next;
922  }
923  if (dups)
924  {
925  //there appears to be at least 2 vertices at BottomPt so ...
926  while (dups != p)
927  {
928  if (!FirstIsBottomPt(p, dups))
929  pp = dups;
930  dups = dups->Next;
931  while (dups->Pt != pp->Pt)
932  dups = dups->Next;
933  }
934  }
935  return pp;
936  }
937 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
938 
939  bool Pt2IsBetweenPt1AndPt3(const IntPoint pt1,
940  const IntPoint pt2, const IntPoint pt3)
941  {
942  if ((pt1 == pt3) || (pt1 == pt2) || (pt3 == pt2))
943  return false;
944  else if (pt1.X != pt3.X)
945  return (pt2.X > pt1.X) == (pt2.X < pt3.X);
946  else
947  return (pt2.Y > pt1.Y) == (pt2.Y < pt3.Y);
948  }
949 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
950 
951  bool HorzSegmentsOverlap(cInt seg1a, cInt seg1b, cInt seg2a, cInt seg2b)
952  {
953  if (seg1a > seg1b)
954  std::swap(seg1a, seg1b);
955  if (seg2a > seg2b)
956  std::swap(seg2a, seg2b);
957  return (seg1a < seg2b) && (seg2a < seg1b);
958  }
959 
960 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
961 // ClipperBase class methods ...
962 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
963 
964  ClipperBase::ClipperBase() //constructor
965  {
966  m_CurrentLM = m_MinimaList.begin(); //begin() == end() here
967  m_UseFullRange = false;
968  }
969 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
970 
971  ClipperBase::~ClipperBase() //destructor
972  {
973  Clear();
974  }
975 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
976 
977  void RangeTest(const IntPoint &Pt, bool &useFullRange)
978  {
979  if (useFullRange)
980  {
981  if (Pt.X > hiRange || Pt.Y > hiRange || -Pt.X > hiRange || -Pt.Y > hiRange)
982  throw clipperException("Coordinate outside allowed range");
983  } else if (Pt.X > loRange || Pt.Y > loRange || -Pt.X > loRange || -Pt.Y > loRange)
984  {
985  useFullRange = true;
986  RangeTest(Pt, useFullRange);
987  }
988  }
989 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
990 
991  TEdge *FindNextLocMin(TEdge *E)
992  {
993  for (;;)
994  {
995  while (E->Bot != E->Prev->Bot || E->Curr == E->Top)
996  E = E->Next;
997  if (!IsHorizontal(*E) && !IsHorizontal(*E->Prev))
998  break;
999  while (IsHorizontal(*E->Prev))
1000  E = E->Prev;
1001  TEdge *E2 = E;
1002  while (IsHorizontal(*E))
1003  E = E->Next;
1004  if (E->Top.Y == E->Prev->Bot.Y)
1005  continue; //ie just an intermediate horz.
1006  if (E2->Prev->Bot.X < E->Bot.X)
1007  E = E2;
1008  break;
1009  }
1010  return E;
1011  }
1012 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1013 
1014  TEdge *ClipperBase::ProcessBound(TEdge *E, bool NextIsForward)
1015  {
1016  TEdge *Result = E;
1017  TEdge *Horz = 0;
1018 
1019  if (E->OutIdx == Skip)
1020  {
1021  //if edges still remain in the current bound beyond the skip edge then
1022  //create another LocMin and call ProcessBound once more
1023  if (NextIsForward)
1024  {
1025  while (E->Top.Y == E->Next->Bot.Y)
1026  E = E->Next;
1027  //don't include top horizontals when parsing a bound a second time,
1028  //they will be contained in the opposite bound ...
1029  while (E != Result && IsHorizontal(*E))
1030  E = E->Prev;
1031  } else
1032  {
1033  while (E->Top.Y == E->Prev->Bot.Y)
1034  E = E->Prev;
1035  while (E != Result && IsHorizontal(*E))
1036  E = E->Next;
1037  }
1038 
1039  if (E == Result)
1040  {
1041  if (NextIsForward)
1042  Result = E->Next;
1043  else
1044  Result = E->Prev;
1045  } else
1046  {
1047  //there are more edges in the bound beyond result starting with E
1048  if (NextIsForward)
1049  E = Result->Next;
1050  else
1051  E = Result->Prev;
1052  MinimaList::value_type locMin;
1053  locMin.Y = E->Bot.Y;
1054  locMin.LeftBound = 0;
1055  locMin.RightBound = E;
1056  E->WindDelta = 0;
1057  Result = ProcessBound(E, NextIsForward);
1058  m_MinimaList.push_back(locMin);
1059  }
1060  return Result;
1061  }
1062 
1063  TEdge *EStart;
1064 
1065  if (IsHorizontal(*E))
1066  {
1067  //We need to be careful with open paths because this may not be a
1068  //true local minima (ie E may be following a skip edge).
1069  //Also, consecutive horz. edges may start heading left before going right.
1070  if (NextIsForward)
1071  EStart = E->Prev;
1072  else
1073  EStart = E->Next;
1074  if (IsHorizontal(*EStart)) //ie an adjoining horizontal skip edge
1075  {
1076  if (EStart->Bot.X != E->Bot.X && EStart->Top.X != E->Bot.X)
1077  ReverseHorizontal(*E);
1078  } else if (EStart->Bot.X != E->Bot.X)
1079  ReverseHorizontal(*E);
1080  }
1081 
1082  EStart = E;
1083  if (NextIsForward)
1084  {
1085  while (Result->Top.Y == Result->Next->Bot.Y && Result->Next->OutIdx != Skip)
1086  Result = Result->Next;
1087  if (IsHorizontal(*Result) && Result->Next->OutIdx != Skip)
1088  {
1089  //nb: at the top of a bound, horizontals are added to the bound
1090  //only when the preceding edge attaches to the horizontal's left vertex
1091  //unless a Skip edge is encountered when that becomes the top divide
1092  Horz = Result;
1093  while (IsHorizontal(*Horz->Prev))
1094  Horz = Horz->Prev;
1095  if (Horz->Prev->Top.X > Result->Next->Top.X)
1096  Result = Horz->Prev;
1097  }
1098  while (E != Result)
1099  {
1100  E->NextInLML = E->Next;
1101  if (IsHorizontal(*E) && E != EStart &&
1102  E->Bot.X != E->Prev->Top.X)
1103  ReverseHorizontal(*E);
1104  E = E->Next;
1105  }
1106  if (IsHorizontal(*E) && E != EStart && E->Bot.X != E->Prev->Top.X)
1107  ReverseHorizontal(*E);
1108  Result = Result->Next; //move to the edge just beyond current bound
1109  } else
1110  {
1111  while (Result->Top.Y == Result->Prev->Bot.Y && Result->Prev->OutIdx != Skip)
1112  Result = Result->Prev;
1113  if (IsHorizontal(*Result) && Result->Prev->OutIdx != Skip)
1114  {
1115  Horz = Result;
1116  while (IsHorizontal(*Horz->Next))
1117  Horz = Horz->Next;
1118  if (Horz->Next->Top.X == Result->Prev->Top.X ||
1119  Horz->Next->Top.X > Result->Prev->Top.X)
1120  Result = Horz->Next;
1121  }
1122 
1123  while (E != Result)
1124  {
1125  E->NextInLML = E->Prev;
1126  if (IsHorizontal(*E) && E != EStart && E->Bot.X != E->Next->Top.X)
1127  ReverseHorizontal(*E);
1128  E = E->Prev;
1129  }
1130  if (IsHorizontal(*E) && E != EStart && E->Bot.X != E->Next->Top.X)
1131  ReverseHorizontal(*E);
1132  Result = Result->Prev; //move to the edge just beyond current bound
1133  }
1134 
1135  return Result;
1136  }
1137 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1138 
1139  bool ClipperBase::AddPath(const Path &pg, PolyType PolyTyp, bool Closed)
1140  {
1141 #ifdef use_lines
1142  if (!Closed && PolyTyp == ptClip)
1143  throw clipperException("AddPath: Open paths must be subject.");
1144 #else
1145  if (!Closed)
1146  throw clipperException("AddPath: Open paths have been disabled.");
1147 #endif
1148 
1149  int highI = (int) pg.size() - 1;
1150  if (Closed)
1151  while (highI > 0 && (pg[highI] == pg[0]))
1152  --highI;
1153  while (highI > 0 && (pg[highI] == pg[highI - 1]))
1154  --highI;
1155  if ((Closed && highI < 2) || (!Closed && highI < 1))
1156  return false;
1157 
1158  //create a new edge array ...
1159  TEdge *edges = new TEdge[highI + 1];
1160 
1161  bool IsFlat = true;
1162  //1. Basic (first) edge initialization ...
1163  try
1164  {
1165  edges[1].Curr = pg[1];
1166  RangeTest(pg[0], m_UseFullRange);
1167  RangeTest(pg[highI], m_UseFullRange);
1168  InitEdge(&edges[0], &edges[1], &edges[highI], pg[0]);
1169  InitEdge(&edges[highI], &edges[0], &edges[highI - 1], pg[highI]);
1170  for (int i = highI - 1; i >= 1; --i)
1171  {
1172  RangeTest(pg[i], m_UseFullRange);
1173  InitEdge(&edges[i], &edges[i + 1], &edges[i - 1], pg[i]);
1174  }
1175  }
1176  catch (...)
1177  {
1178  delete[] edges;
1179  throw; //range test fails
1180  }
1181  TEdge *eStart = &edges[0];
1182 
1183  //2. Remove duplicate vertices, and (when closed) collinear edges ...
1184  TEdge *E = eStart, *eLoopStop = eStart;
1185  for (;;)
1186  {
1187  //nb: allows matching start and end points when not Closed ...
1188  if (E->Curr == E->Next->Curr && (Closed || E->Next != eStart))
1189  {
1190  if (E == E->Next)
1191  break;
1192  if (E == eStart)
1193  eStart = E->Next;
1194  E = RemoveEdge(E);
1195  eLoopStop = E;
1196  continue;
1197  }
1198  if (E->Prev == E->Next)
1199  break; //only two vertices
1200  else if (Closed &&
1201  SlopesEqual(E->Prev->Curr, E->Curr, E->Next->Curr, m_UseFullRange) &&
1202  (!m_PreserveCollinear ||
1203  !Pt2IsBetweenPt1AndPt3(E->Prev->Curr, E->Curr, E->Next->Curr)))
1204  {
1205  //Collinear edges are allowed for open paths but in closed paths
1206  //the default is to merge adjacent collinear edges into a single edge.
1207  //However, if the PreserveCollinear property is enabled, only overlapping
1208  //collinear edges (ie spikes) will be removed from closed paths.
1209  if (E == eStart)
1210  eStart = E->Next;
1211  E = RemoveEdge(E);
1212  E = E->Prev;
1213  eLoopStop = E;
1214  continue;
1215  }
1216  E = E->Next;
1217  if ((E == eLoopStop) || (!Closed && E->Next == eStart))
1218  break;
1219  }
1220 
1221  if ((!Closed && (E == E->Next)) || (Closed && (E->Prev == E->Next)))
1222  {
1223  delete[] edges;
1224  return false;
1225  }
1226 
1227  if (!Closed)
1228  {
1229  m_HasOpenPaths = true;
1230  eStart->Prev->OutIdx = Skip;
1231  }
1232 
1233  //3. Do second stage of edge initialization ...
1234  E = eStart;
1235  do
1236  {
1237  InitEdge2(*E, PolyTyp);
1238  E = E->Next;
1239  if (IsFlat && E->Curr.Y != eStart->Curr.Y)
1240  IsFlat = false;
1241  } while (E != eStart);
1242 
1243  //4. Finally, add edge bounds to LocalMinima list ...
1244 
1245  //Totally flat paths must be handled differently when adding them
1246  //to LocalMinima list to avoid endless loops etc ...
1247  if (IsFlat)
1248  {
1249  if (Closed)
1250  {
1251  delete[] edges;
1252  return false;
1253  }
1254  E->Prev->OutIdx = Skip;
1255  MinimaList::value_type locMin;
1256  locMin.Y = E->Bot.Y;
1257  locMin.LeftBound = 0;
1258  locMin.RightBound = E;
1259  locMin.RightBound->Side = esRight;
1260  locMin.RightBound->WindDelta = 0;
1261  for (;;)
1262  {
1263  if (E->Bot.X != E->Prev->Top.X)
1264  ReverseHorizontal(*E);
1265  if (E->Next->OutIdx == Skip)
1266  break;
1267  E->NextInLML = E->Next;
1268  E = E->Next;
1269  }
1270  m_MinimaList.push_back(locMin);
1271  m_edges.push_back(edges);
1272  return true;
1273  }
1274 
1275  m_edges.push_back(edges);
1276  bool leftBoundIsForward;
1277  TEdge *EMin = 0;
1278 
1279  //workaround to avoid an endless loop in the while loop below when
1280  //open paths have matching start and end points ...
1281  if (E->Prev->Bot == E->Prev->Top)
1282  E = E->Next;
1283 
1284  for (;;)
1285  {
1286  E = FindNextLocMin(E);
1287  if (E == EMin)
1288  break;
1289  else if (!EMin)
1290  EMin = E;
1291 
1292  //E and E.Prev now share a local minima (left aligned if horizontal).
1293  //Compare their slopes to find which starts which bound ...
1294  MinimaList::value_type locMin;
1295  locMin.Y = E->Bot.Y;
1296  if (E->Dx < E->Prev->Dx)
1297  {
1298  locMin.LeftBound = E->Prev;
1299  locMin.RightBound = E;
1300  leftBoundIsForward = false; //Q.nextInLML = Q.prev
1301  } else
1302  {
1303  locMin.LeftBound = E;
1304  locMin.RightBound = E->Prev;
1305  leftBoundIsForward = true; //Q.nextInLML = Q.next
1306  }
1307 
1308  if (!Closed)
1309  locMin.LeftBound->WindDelta = 0;
1310  else if (locMin.LeftBound->Next == locMin.RightBound)
1311  locMin.LeftBound->WindDelta = -1;
1312  else
1313  locMin.LeftBound->WindDelta = 1;
1314  locMin.RightBound->WindDelta = -locMin.LeftBound->WindDelta;
1315 
1316  E = ProcessBound(locMin.LeftBound, leftBoundIsForward);
1317  if (E->OutIdx == Skip)
1318  E = ProcessBound(E, leftBoundIsForward);
1319 
1320  TEdge *E2 = ProcessBound(locMin.RightBound, !leftBoundIsForward);
1321  if (E2->OutIdx == Skip)
1322  E2 = ProcessBound(E2, !leftBoundIsForward);
1323 
1324  if (locMin.LeftBound->OutIdx == Skip)
1325  locMin.LeftBound = 0;
1326  else if (locMin.RightBound->OutIdx == Skip)
1327  locMin.RightBound = 0;
1328  m_MinimaList.push_back(locMin);
1329  if (!leftBoundIsForward)
1330  E = E2;
1331  }
1332  return true;
1333  }
1334 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1335 
1336  bool ClipperBase::AddPaths(const Paths &ppg, PolyType PolyTyp, bool Closed)
1337  {
1338  bool result = false;
1339  for (Paths::size_type i = 0; i < ppg.size(); ++i)
1340  if (AddPath(ppg[i], PolyTyp, Closed))
1341  result = true;
1342  return result;
1343  }
1344 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1345 
1346  void ClipperBase::Clear()
1347  {
1348  DisposeLocalMinimaList();
1349  for (EdgeList::size_type i = 0; i < m_edges.size(); ++i)
1350  {
1351  TEdge *edges = m_edges[i];
1352  delete[] edges;
1353  }
1354  m_edges.clear();
1355  m_UseFullRange = false;
1356  m_HasOpenPaths = false;
1357  }
1358 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1359 
1360  void ClipperBase::Reset()
1361  {
1362  m_CurrentLM = m_MinimaList.begin();
1363  if (m_CurrentLM == m_MinimaList.end())
1364  return; //ie nothing to process
1365  std::sort(m_MinimaList.begin(), m_MinimaList.end(), LocMinSorter());
1366 
1367  m_Scanbeam = ScanbeamList(); //clears/resets priority_queue
1368  //reset all edges ...
1369  for (MinimaList::iterator lm = m_MinimaList.begin(); lm != m_MinimaList.end(); ++lm)
1370  {
1371  InsertScanbeam(lm->Y);
1372  TEdge *e = lm->LeftBound;
1373  if (e)
1374  {
1375  e->Curr = e->Bot;
1376  e->Side = esLeft;
1377  e->OutIdx = Unassigned;
1378  }
1379 
1380  e = lm->RightBound;
1381  if (e)
1382  {
1383  e->Curr = e->Bot;
1384  e->Side = esRight;
1385  e->OutIdx = Unassigned;
1386  }
1387  }
1388  m_ActiveEdges = 0;
1389  m_CurrentLM = m_MinimaList.begin();
1390  }
1391 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1392 
1393  void ClipperBase::DisposeLocalMinimaList()
1394  {
1395  m_MinimaList.clear();
1396  m_CurrentLM = m_MinimaList.begin();
1397  }
1398 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1399 
1400  bool ClipperBase::PopLocalMinima(cInt Y, const LocalMinimum *&locMin)
1401  {
1402  if (m_CurrentLM == m_MinimaList.end() || (*m_CurrentLM).Y != Y)
1403  return false;
1404  locMin = &(*m_CurrentLM);
1405  ++m_CurrentLM;
1406  return true;
1407  }
1408 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1409 
1410  IntRect ClipperBase::GetBounds()
1411  {
1412  IntRect result;
1413  MinimaList::iterator lm = m_MinimaList.begin();
1414  if (lm == m_MinimaList.end())
1415  {
1416  result.left = result.top = result.right = result.bottom = 0;
1417  return result;
1418  }
1419  result.left = lm->LeftBound->Bot.X;
1420  result.top = lm->LeftBound->Bot.Y;
1421  result.right = lm->LeftBound->Bot.X;
1422  result.bottom = lm->LeftBound->Bot.Y;
1423  while (lm != m_MinimaList.end())
1424  {
1425  //todo - needs fixing for open paths
1426  result.bottom = std::max(result.bottom, lm->LeftBound->Bot.Y);
1427  TEdge *e = lm->LeftBound;
1428  for (;;)
1429  {
1430  TEdge *bottomE = e;
1431  while (e->NextInLML)
1432  {
1433  if (e->Bot.X < result.left)
1434  result.left = e->Bot.X;
1435  if (e->Bot.X > result.right)
1436  result.right = e->Bot.X;
1437  e = e->NextInLML;
1438  }
1439  result.left = std::min(result.left, e->Bot.X);
1440  result.right = std::max(result.right, e->Bot.X);
1441  result.left = std::min(result.left, e->Top.X);
1442  result.right = std::max(result.right, e->Top.X);
1443  result.top = std::min(result.top, e->Top.Y);
1444  if (bottomE == lm->LeftBound)
1445  e = lm->RightBound;
1446  else
1447  break;
1448  }
1449  ++lm;
1450  }
1451  return result;
1452  }
1453 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1454 
1455  void ClipperBase::InsertScanbeam(const cInt Y)
1456  {
1457  m_Scanbeam.push(Y);
1458  }
1459 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1460 
1461  bool ClipperBase::PopScanbeam(cInt &Y)
1462  {
1463  if (m_Scanbeam.empty())
1464  return false;
1465  Y = m_Scanbeam.top();
1466  m_Scanbeam.pop();
1467  while (!m_Scanbeam.empty() && Y == m_Scanbeam.top())
1468  {
1469  m_Scanbeam.pop();
1470  } // Pop duplicates.
1471  return true;
1472  }
1473 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1474 
1475  void ClipperBase::DisposeAllOutRecs()
1476  {
1477  for (PolyOutList::size_type i = 0; i < m_PolyOuts.size(); ++i)
1478  DisposeOutRec(i);
1479  m_PolyOuts.clear();
1480  }
1481 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1482 
1483  void ClipperBase::DisposeOutRec(PolyOutList::size_type index)
1484  {
1485  OutRec *outRec = m_PolyOuts[index];
1486  if (outRec->Pts)
1487  DisposeOutPts(outRec->Pts);
1488  delete outRec;
1489  m_PolyOuts[index] = 0;
1490  }
1491 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1492 
1493  void ClipperBase::DeleteFromAEL(TEdge *e)
1494  {
1495  TEdge *AelPrev = e->PrevInAEL;
1496  TEdge *AelNext = e->NextInAEL;
1497  if (!AelPrev && !AelNext && (e != m_ActiveEdges))
1498  return; //already deleted
1499  if (AelPrev)
1500  AelPrev->NextInAEL = AelNext;
1501  else
1502  m_ActiveEdges = AelNext;
1503  if (AelNext)
1504  AelNext->PrevInAEL = AelPrev;
1505  e->NextInAEL = 0;
1506  e->PrevInAEL = 0;
1507  }
1508 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1509 
1510  OutRec *ClipperBase::CreateOutRec()
1511  {
1512  OutRec *result = new OutRec;
1513  result->IsHole = false;
1514  result->IsOpen = false;
1515  result->FirstLeft = 0;
1516  result->Pts = 0;
1517  result->BottomPt = 0;
1518  result->PolyNd = 0;
1519  m_PolyOuts.push_back(result);
1520  result->Idx = (int) m_PolyOuts.size() - 1;
1521  return result;
1522  }
1523 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1524 
1525  void ClipperBase::SwapPositionsInAEL(TEdge *Edge1, TEdge *Edge2)
1526  {
1527  //check that one or other edge hasn't already been removed from AEL ...
1528  if (Edge1->NextInAEL == Edge1->PrevInAEL ||
1529  Edge2->NextInAEL == Edge2->PrevInAEL)
1530  return;
1531 
1532  if (Edge1->NextInAEL == Edge2)
1533  {
1534  TEdge *Next = Edge2->NextInAEL;
1535  if (Next)
1536  Next->PrevInAEL = Edge1;
1537  TEdge *Prev = Edge1->PrevInAEL;
1538  if (Prev)
1539  Prev->NextInAEL = Edge2;
1540  Edge2->PrevInAEL = Prev;
1541  Edge2->NextInAEL = Edge1;
1542  Edge1->PrevInAEL = Edge2;
1543  Edge1->NextInAEL = Next;
1544  } else if (Edge2->NextInAEL == Edge1)
1545  {
1546  TEdge *Next = Edge1->NextInAEL;
1547  if (Next)
1548  Next->PrevInAEL = Edge2;
1549  TEdge *Prev = Edge2->PrevInAEL;
1550  if (Prev)
1551  Prev->NextInAEL = Edge1;
1552  Edge1->PrevInAEL = Prev;
1553  Edge1->NextInAEL = Edge2;
1554  Edge2->PrevInAEL = Edge1;
1555  Edge2->NextInAEL = Next;
1556  } else
1557  {
1558  TEdge *Next = Edge1->NextInAEL;
1559  TEdge *Prev = Edge1->PrevInAEL;
1560  Edge1->NextInAEL = Edge2->NextInAEL;
1561  if (Edge1->NextInAEL)
1562  Edge1->NextInAEL->PrevInAEL = Edge1;
1563  Edge1->PrevInAEL = Edge2->PrevInAEL;
1564  if (Edge1->PrevInAEL)
1565  Edge1->PrevInAEL->NextInAEL = Edge1;
1566  Edge2->NextInAEL = Next;
1567  if (Edge2->NextInAEL)
1568  Edge2->NextInAEL->PrevInAEL = Edge2;
1569  Edge2->PrevInAEL = Prev;
1570  if (Edge2->PrevInAEL)
1571  Edge2->PrevInAEL->NextInAEL = Edge2;
1572  }
1573 
1574  if (!Edge1->PrevInAEL)
1575  m_ActiveEdges = Edge1;
1576  else if (!Edge2->PrevInAEL)
1577  m_ActiveEdges = Edge2;
1578  }
1579 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1580 
1581  void ClipperBase::UpdateEdgeIntoAEL(TEdge *&e)
1582  {
1583  if (!e->NextInLML)
1584  throw clipperException("UpdateEdgeIntoAEL: invalid call");
1585 
1586  e->NextInLML->OutIdx = e->OutIdx;
1587  TEdge *AelPrev = e->PrevInAEL;
1588  TEdge *AelNext = e->NextInAEL;
1589  if (AelPrev)
1590  AelPrev->NextInAEL = e->NextInLML;
1591  else
1592  m_ActiveEdges = e->NextInLML;
1593  if (AelNext)
1594  AelNext->PrevInAEL = e->NextInLML;
1595  e->NextInLML->Side = e->Side;
1596  e->NextInLML->WindDelta = e->WindDelta;
1597  e->NextInLML->WindCnt = e->WindCnt;
1598  e->NextInLML->WindCnt2 = e->WindCnt2;
1599  e = e->NextInLML;
1600  e->Curr = e->Bot;
1601  e->PrevInAEL = AelPrev;
1602  e->NextInAEL = AelNext;
1603  if (!IsHorizontal(*e))
1604  InsertScanbeam(e->Top.Y);
1605  }
1606 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1607 
1608  bool ClipperBase::LocalMinimaPending()
1609  {
1610  return (m_CurrentLM != m_MinimaList.end());
1611  }

1627 #endif

1642  }
1643 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1644 
1645  bool Clipper::Execute(ClipType clipType, PolyTree &polytree, PolyFillType fillType)
1646  {
1647  return Execute(clipType, polytree, fillType, fillType);
1648  }
1649 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1650 
1651  bool Clipper::Execute(ClipType clipType, Paths &solution,
1652  PolyFillType subjFillType, PolyFillType clipFillType)
1653  {
1654  if (m_ExecuteLocked)
1655  return false;
1656  if (m_HasOpenPaths)
1657  throw clipperException("Error: PolyTree struct is needed for open path clipping.");
1658  m_ExecuteLocked = true;
1659  solution.resize(0);
1660  m_SubjFillType = subjFillType;
1661  m_ClipFillType = clipFillType;
1662  m_ClipType = clipType;
1663  m_UsingPolyTree = false;
1664  bool succeeded = ExecuteInternal();
1665  if (succeeded)
1666  BuildResult(solution);
1667  DisposeAllOutRecs();
1668  m_ExecuteLocked = false;
1669  return succeeded;
1670  }
1671 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1672 
1673  bool Clipper::Execute(ClipType clipType, PolyTree &polytree,
1674  PolyFillType subjFillType, PolyFillType clipFillType)
1675  {
1676  if (m_ExecuteLocked)
1677  return false;
1678  m_ExecuteLocked = true;
1679  m_SubjFillType = subjFillType;
1680  m_ClipFillType = clipFillType;
1681  m_ClipType = clipType;
1682  m_UsingPolyTree = true;
1683  bool succeeded = ExecuteInternal();
1684  if (succeeded)
1685  BuildResult2(polytree);
1686  DisposeAllOutRecs();
1687  m_ExecuteLocked = false;
1688  return succeeded;
1689  }
1690 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1691 
1692  void Clipper::FixHoleLinkage(OutRec &outrec)
1693  {
1694  //skip OutRecs that (a) contain outermost polygons or
1695  //(b) already have the correct owner/child linkage ...
1696  if (!outrec.FirstLeft ||
1697  (outrec.IsHole != outrec.FirstLeft->IsHole &&
1698  outrec.FirstLeft->Pts))
1699  return;
1700 
1701  OutRec *orfl = outrec.FirstLeft;
1702  while (orfl && ((orfl->IsHole == outrec.IsHole) || !orfl->Pts))
1703  orfl = orfl->FirstLeft;
1704  outrec.FirstLeft = orfl;
1705  }
1706 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1707 
1708  bool Clipper::ExecuteInternal()
1709  {
1710  bool succeeded = true;
1711  try
1712  {
1713  Reset();
1714  m_Maxima = MaximaList();
1715  m_SortedEdges = 0;
1716 
1717  succeeded = true;
1718  cInt botY, topY;
1719  if (!PopScanbeam(botY))
1720  return false;
1721  InsertLocalMinimaIntoAEL(botY);
1722  while (PopScanbeam(topY) || LocalMinimaPending())
1723  {
1724  ProcessHorizontals();
1725  ClearGhostJoins();
1726  if (!ProcessIntersections(topY))
1727  {
1728  succeeded = false;
1729  break;
1730  }
1731  ProcessEdgesAtTopOfScanbeam(topY);
1732  botY = topY;
1733  InsertLocalMinimaIntoAEL(botY);
1734  }
1735  }
1736  catch (...)
1737  {
1738  succeeded = false;
1739  }
1740 
1741  if (succeeded)
1742  {
1743  //fix orientations ...
1744  for (PolyOutList::size_type i = 0; i < m_PolyOuts.size(); ++i)
1745  {
1746  OutRec *outRec = m_PolyOuts[i];
1747  if (!outRec->Pts || outRec->IsOpen)
1748  continue;
1749  if ((outRec->IsHole ^ m_ReverseOutput) == (Area(*outRec) > 0))
1750  ReversePolyPtLinks(outRec->Pts);
1751  }
1752 
1753  if (!m_Joins.empty())
1754  JoinCommonEdges();
1755 
1756  //unfortunately FixupOutPolygon() must be done after JoinCommonEdges()
1757  for (PolyOutList::size_type i = 0; i < m_PolyOuts.size(); ++i)
1758  {
1759  OutRec *outRec = m_PolyOuts[i];
1760  if (!outRec->Pts)
1761  continue;
1762  if (outRec->IsOpen)
1763  FixupOutPolyline(*outRec);
1764  else
1765  FixupOutPolygon(*outRec);
1766  }
1767 
1768  if (m_StrictSimple)
1769  DoSimplePolygons();
1770  }
1771 
1772  ClearJoins();
1773  ClearGhostJoins();
1774  return succeeded;
1775  }
1776 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1777 
1778  void Clipper::SetWindingCount(TEdge &edge)
1779  {
1780  TEdge *e = edge.PrevInAEL;
1781  //find the edge of the same polytype that immediately preceeds 'edge' in AEL
1782  while (e && ((e->PolyTyp != edge.PolyTyp) || (e->WindDelta == 0)))
1783  e = e->PrevInAEL;
1784  if (!e)
1785  {
1786  if (edge.WindDelta == 0)
1787  {
1788  PolyFillType pft = (edge.PolyTyp == ptSubject ? m_SubjFillType : m_ClipFillType);
1789  edge.WindCnt = (pft == pftNegative ? -1 : 1);
1790  } else
1791  edge.WindCnt = edge.WindDelta;
1792  edge.WindCnt2 = 0;
1793  e = m_ActiveEdges; //ie get ready to calc WindCnt2
1794  } else if (edge.WindDelta == 0 && m_ClipType != ctUnion)
1795  {
1796  edge.WindCnt = 1;
1797  edge.WindCnt2 = e->WindCnt2;
1798  e = e->NextInAEL; //ie get ready to calc WindCnt2
1799  } else if (IsEvenOddFillType(edge))
1800  {
1801  //EvenOdd filling ...
1802  if (edge.WindDelta == 0)
1803  {
1804  //are we inside a subj polygon ...
1805  bool Inside = true;
1806  TEdge *e2 = e->PrevInAEL;
1807  while (e2)
1808  {
1809  if (e2->PolyTyp == e->PolyTyp && e2->WindDelta != 0)
1810  Inside = !Inside;
1811  e2 = e2->PrevInAEL;
1812  }
1813  edge.WindCnt = (Inside ? 0 : 1);
1814  } else
1815  {
1816  edge.WindCnt = edge.WindDelta;
1817  }
1818  edge.WindCnt2 = e->WindCnt2;
1819  e = e->NextInAEL; //ie get ready to calc WindCnt2
1820  } else
1821  {
1822  //nonZero, Positive or Negative filling ...
1823  if (e->WindCnt * e->WindDelta < 0)
1824  {
1825  //prev edge is 'decreasing' WindCount (WC) toward zero
1826  //so we're outside the previous polygon ...
1827  if (Abs(e->WindCnt) > 1)
1828  {
1829  //outside prev poly but still inside another.
1830  //when reversing direction of prev poly use the same WC
1831  if (e->WindDelta * edge.WindDelta < 0)
1832  edge.WindCnt = e->WindCnt;
1833  //otherwise continue to 'decrease' WC ...
1834  else
1835  edge.WindCnt = e->WindCnt + edge.WindDelta;
1836  } else
1837  //now outside all polys of same polytype so set own WC ...
1838  edge.WindCnt = (edge.WindDelta == 0 ? 1 : edge.WindDelta);
1839  } else
1840  {
1841  //prev edge is 'increasing' WindCount (WC) away from zero
1842  //so we're inside the previous polygon ...
1843  if (edge.WindDelta == 0)
1844  edge.WindCnt = (e->WindCnt < 0 ? e->WindCnt - 1 : e->WindCnt + 1);
1845  //if wind direction is reversing prev then use same WC
1846  else if (e->WindDelta * edge.WindDelta < 0)
1847  edge.WindCnt = e->WindCnt;
1848  //otherwise add to WC ...
1849  else
1850  edge.WindCnt = e->WindCnt + edge.WindDelta;
1851  }
1852  edge.WindCnt2 = e->WindCnt2;
1853  e = e->NextInAEL; //ie get ready to calc WindCnt2
1854  }
1855 
1856  //update WindCnt2 ...
1857  if (IsEvenOddAltFillType(edge))
1858  {
1859  //EvenOdd filling ...
1860  while (e != &edge)
1861  {
1862  if (e->WindDelta != 0)
1863  edge.WindCnt2 = (edge.WindCnt2 == 0 ? 1 : 0);
1864  e = e->NextInAEL;
1865  }
1866  } else
1867  {
1868  //nonZero, Positive or Negative filling ...
1869  while (e != &edge)
1870  {
1871  edge.WindCnt2 += e->WindDelta;
1872  e = e->NextInAEL;
1873  }
1874  }
1875  }
1876 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1877 
1878  bool Clipper::IsEvenOddFillType(const TEdge &edge) const
1879  {
1880  if (edge.PolyTyp == ptSubject)
1881  return m_SubjFillType == pftEvenOdd;
1882  else
1883  return m_ClipFillType == pftEvenOdd;
1884  }
1885 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1886 
1887  bool Clipper::IsEvenOddAltFillType(const TEdge &edge) const
1888  {
1889  if (edge.PolyTyp == ptSubject)
1890  return m_ClipFillType == pftEvenOdd;
1891  else
1892  return m_SubjFillType == pftEvenOdd;
1893  }
1894 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1895 
1896  bool Clipper::IsContributing(const TEdge &edge) const
1897  {
1898  PolyFillType pft, pft2;
1899  if (edge.PolyTyp == ptSubject)
1900  {
1901  pft = m_SubjFillType;
1902  pft2 = m_ClipFillType;
1903  } else
1904  {
1905  pft = m_ClipFillType;
1906  pft2 = m_SubjFillType;
1907  }
1908 
1909  switch (pft)
1910  {
1911  case pftEvenOdd:
1912  //return false if a subj line has been flagged as inside a subj polygon
1913  if (edge.WindDelta == 0 && edge.WindCnt != 1)
1914  return false;
1915  break;
1916  case pftNonZero:
1917  if (Abs(edge.WindCnt) != 1)
1918  return false;
1919  break;
1920  case pftPositive:
1921  if (edge.WindCnt != 1)
1922  return false;
1923  break;
1924  default: //pftNegative
1925  if (edge.WindCnt != -1)
1926  return false;
1927  }
1928 
1929  switch (m_ClipType)
1930  {
1931  case ctIntersection:
1932  switch (pft2)
1933  {
1934  case pftEvenOdd:
1935  case pftNonZero:
1936  return (edge.WindCnt2 != 0);
1937  case pftPositive:
1938  return (edge.WindCnt2 > 0);
1939  default:
1940  return (edge.WindCnt2 < 0);
1941  }
1942  break;
1943  case ctUnion:
1944  switch (pft2)
1945  {
1946  case pftEvenOdd:
1947  case pftNonZero:
1948  return (edge.WindCnt2 == 0);
1949  case pftPositive:
1950  return (edge.WindCnt2 <= 0);
1951  default:
1952  return (edge.WindCnt2 >= 0);
1953  }
1954  break;
1955  case ctDifference:
1956  if (edge.PolyTyp == ptSubject)
1957  switch (pft2)
1958  {
1959  case pftEvenOdd:
1960  case pftNonZero:
1961  return (edge.WindCnt2 == 0);
1962  case pftPositive:
1963  return (edge.WindCnt2 <= 0);
1964  default:
1965  return (edge.WindCnt2 >= 0);
1966  }
1967  else
1968  switch (pft2)
1969  {
1970  case pftEvenOdd:
1971  case pftNonZero:
1972  return (edge.WindCnt2 != 0);
1973  case pftPositive:
1974  return (edge.WindCnt2 > 0);
1975  default:
1976  return (edge.WindCnt2 < 0);
1977  }
1978  break;
1979  case ctXor:
1980  if (edge.WindDelta == 0) //XOr always contributing unless open
1981  switch (pft2)
1982  {
1983  case pftEvenOdd:
1984  case pftNonZero:
1985  return (edge.WindCnt2 == 0);
1986  case pftPositive:
1987  return (edge.WindCnt2 <= 0);
1988  default:
1989  return (edge.WindCnt2 >= 0);
1990  }
1991  else
1992  return true;
1993  break;
1994  default:
1995  return true;
1996  }
1997  }
1998 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1999 
2000  OutPt *Clipper::AddLocalMinPoly(TEdge *e1, TEdge *e2, const IntPoint &Pt)
2001  {
2002  OutPt *result;
2003  TEdge *e, *prevE;
2004  if (IsHorizontal(*e2) || (e1->Dx > e2->Dx))
2005  {
2006  result = AddOutPt(e1, Pt);
2007  e2->OutIdx = e1->OutIdx;
2008  e1->Side = esLeft;
2009  e2->Side = esRight;
2010  e = e1;
2011  if (e->PrevInAEL == e2)
2012  prevE = e2->PrevInAEL;
2013  else
2014  prevE = e->PrevInAEL;
2015  } else
2016  {
2017  result = AddOutPt(e2, Pt);
2018  e1->OutIdx = e2->OutIdx;
2019  e1->Side = esRight;
2020  e2->Side = esLeft;
2021  e = e2;
2022  if (e->PrevInAEL == e1)
2023  prevE = e1->PrevInAEL;
2024  else
2025  prevE = e->PrevInAEL;
2026  }
2027 
2028  if (prevE && prevE->OutIdx >= 0 && prevE->Top.Y < Pt.Y && e->Top.Y < Pt.Y)
2029  {
2030  cInt xPrev = TopX(*prevE, Pt.Y);
2031  cInt xE = TopX(*e, Pt.Y);
2032  if (xPrev == xE && (e->WindDelta != 0) && (prevE->WindDelta != 0) &&
2033  SlopesEqual(IntPoint(xPrev, Pt.Y), prevE->Top, IntPoint(xE, Pt.Y), e->Top, m_UseFullRange))
2034  {
2035  OutPt *outPt = AddOutPt(prevE, Pt);
2036  AddJoin(result, outPt, e->Top);
2037  }
2038  }
2039  return result;
2040  }
2041 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2042 
2043  void Clipper::AddLocalMaxPoly(TEdge *e1, TEdge *e2, const IntPoint &Pt)
2044  {
2045  AddOutPt(e1, Pt);
2046  if (e2->WindDelta == 0)
2047  AddOutPt(e2, Pt);
2048  if (e1->OutIdx == e2->OutIdx)
2049  {
2050  e1->OutIdx = Unassigned;
2051  e2->OutIdx = Unassigned;
2052  } else if (e1->OutIdx < e2->OutIdx)
2053  AppendPolygon(e1, e2);
2054  else
2055  AppendPolygon(e2, e1);
2056  }
2057 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2058 
2059  void Clipper::AddEdgeToSEL(TEdge *edge)
2060  {
2061  //SEL pointers in PEdge are reused to build a list of horizontal edges.
2062  //However, we don't need to worry about order with horizontal edge processing.
2063  if (!m_SortedEdges)
2064  {
2065  m_SortedEdges = edge;
2066  edge->PrevInSEL = 0;
2067  edge->NextInSEL = 0;
2068  } else
2069  {
2070  edge->NextInSEL = m_SortedEdges;
2071  edge->PrevInSEL = 0;
2072  m_SortedEdges->PrevInSEL = edge;
2073  m_SortedEdges = edge;
2074  }
2075  }
2076 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2077 
2078  bool Clipper::PopEdgeFromSEL(TEdge *&edge)
2079  {
2080  if (!m_SortedEdges)
2081  return false;
2082  edge = m_SortedEdges;
2083  DeleteFromSEL(m_SortedEdges);
2084  return true;
2085  }
2086 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2087 
2088  void Clipper::CopyAELToSEL()
2089  {
2090  TEdge *e = m_ActiveEdges;
2091  m_SortedEdges = e;
2092  while (e)
2093  {
2094  e->PrevInSEL = e->PrevInAEL;
2095  e->NextInSEL = e->NextInAEL;
2096  e = e->NextInAEL;
2097  }
2098  }
2099 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2100 
2101  void Clipper::AddJoin(OutPt *op1, OutPt *op2, const IntPoint OffPt)
2102  {
2103  Join *j = new Join;
2104  j->OutPt1 = op1;
2105  j->OutPt2 = op2;
2106  j->OffPt = OffPt;
2107  m_Joins.push_back(j);
2108  }

2112  {
2113  for (JoinList::size_type i = 0; i < m_Joins.size(); i++)
2114  delete m_Joins[i];
2115  m_Joins.resize(0);
2116  }
