2120  {
2121  for (JoinList::size_type i = 0; i < m_GhostJoins.size(); i++)
2122  delete m_GhostJoins[i];
2123  m_GhostJoins.resize(0);
2124  }
2125 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2126 
2127  void Clipper::AddGhostJoin(OutPt *op, const IntPoint OffPt)
2128  {
2129  Join *j = new Join;
2130  j->OutPt1 = op;
2131  j->OutPt2 = 0;
2132  j->OffPt = OffPt;
2133  m_GhostJoins.push_back(j);
2134  }
2135 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2136 
2137  void Clipper::InsertLocalMinimaIntoAEL(const cInt botY)
2138  {
2139  const LocalMinimum *lm;
2140  while (PopLocalMinima(botY, lm))
2141  {
2142  TEdge *lb = lm->LeftBound;
2143  TEdge *rb = lm->RightBound;
2144 
2145  OutPt *Op1 = 0;
2146  if (!lb)
2147  {
2148  //nb: don't insert LB into either AEL or SEL
2149  InsertEdgeIntoAEL(rb, 0);
2150  SetWindingCount(*rb);
2151  if (IsContributing(*rb))
2152  Op1 = AddOutPt(rb, rb->Bot);
2153  } else if (!rb)
2154  {
2155  InsertEdgeIntoAEL(lb, 0);
2156  SetWindingCount(*lb);
2157  if (IsContributing(*lb))
2158  Op1 = AddOutPt(lb, lb->Bot);
2159  InsertScanbeam(lb->Top.Y);
2160  } else
2161  {
2162  InsertEdgeIntoAEL(lb, 0);
2163  InsertEdgeIntoAEL(rb, lb);
2164  SetWindingCount(*lb);
2165  rb->WindCnt = lb->WindCnt;
2166  rb->WindCnt2 = lb->WindCnt2;
2167  if (IsContributing(*lb))
2168  Op1 = AddLocalMinPoly(lb, rb, lb->Bot);
2169  InsertScanbeam(lb->Top.Y);
2170  }
2171 
2172  if (rb)
2173  {
2174  if (IsHorizontal(*rb))
2175  {
2176  AddEdgeToSEL(rb);
2177  if (rb->NextInLML)
2178  InsertScanbeam(rb->NextInLML->Top.Y);
2179  } else
2180  InsertScanbeam(rb->Top.Y);
2181  }
2182 
2183  if (!lb || !rb)
2184  continue;
2185 
2186  //if any output polygons share an edge, they'll need joining later ...
2187  if (Op1 && IsHorizontal(*rb) &&
2188  m_GhostJoins.size() > 0 && (rb->WindDelta != 0))
2189  {
2190  for (JoinList::size_type i = 0; i < m_GhostJoins.size(); ++i)
2191  {
2192  Join *jr = m_GhostJoins[i];
2193  //if the horizontal Rb and a 'ghost' horizontal overlap, then convert
2194  //the 'ghost' join to a real join ready for later ...
2195  if (HorzSegmentsOverlap(jr->OutPt1->Pt.X, jr->OffPt.X, rb->Bot.X, rb->Top.X))
2196  AddJoin(jr->OutPt1, Op1, jr->OffPt);
2197  }
2198  }
2199 
2200  if (lb->OutIdx >= 0 && lb->PrevInAEL &&
2201  lb->PrevInAEL->Curr.X == lb->Bot.X &&
2202  lb->PrevInAEL->OutIdx >= 0 &&
2203  SlopesEqual(lb->PrevInAEL->Bot, lb->PrevInAEL->Top, lb->Curr, lb->Top, m_UseFullRange) &&
2204  (lb->WindDelta != 0) && (lb->PrevInAEL->WindDelta != 0))
2205  {
2206  OutPt *Op2 = AddOutPt(lb->PrevInAEL, lb->Bot);
2207  AddJoin(Op1, Op2, lb->Top);
2208  }
2209 
2210  if (lb->NextInAEL != rb)
2211  {
2212 
2213  if (rb->OutIdx >= 0 && rb->PrevInAEL->OutIdx >= 0 &&
2214  SlopesEqual(rb->PrevInAEL->Curr, rb->PrevInAEL->Top, rb->Curr, rb->Top, m_UseFullRange) &&
2215  (rb->WindDelta != 0) && (rb->PrevInAEL->WindDelta != 0))
2216  {
2217  OutPt *Op2 = AddOutPt(rb->PrevInAEL, rb->Bot);
2218  AddJoin(Op1, Op2, rb->Top);
2219  }
2220 
2221  TEdge *e = lb->NextInAEL;
2222  if (e)
2223  {
2224  while (e != rb)
2225  {
2226  //nb: For calculating winding counts etc, IntersectEdges() assumes
2227  //that param1 will be to the Right of param2 ABOVE the intersection ...
2228  IntersectEdges(rb, e, lb->Curr); //order important here
2229  e = e->NextInAEL;
2230  }
2231  }
2232  }
2233 
2234  }
2235  }
2236 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2237 
2238  void Clipper::DeleteFromSEL(TEdge *e)
2239  {
2240  TEdge *SelPrev = e->PrevInSEL;
2241  TEdge *SelNext = e->NextInSEL;
2242  if (!SelPrev && !SelNext && (e != m_SortedEdges))
2243  return; //already deleted
2244  if (SelPrev)
2245  SelPrev->NextInSEL = SelNext;
2246  else
2247  m_SortedEdges = SelNext;
2248  if (SelNext)
2249  SelNext->PrevInSEL = SelPrev;
2250  e->NextInSEL = 0;
2251  e->PrevInSEL = 0;
2252  }
2253 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2254 
2255 #ifdef use_xyz
2256  void Clipper::SetZ(IntPoint& pt, TEdge& e1, TEdge& e2)
2257 {
2258  if (pt.Z != 0 || !m_ZFill) return;
2259  else if (pt == e1.Bot) pt.Z = e1.Bot.Z;
2260  else if (pt == e1.Top) pt.Z = e1.Top.Z;
2261  else if (pt == e2.Bot) pt.Z = e2.Bot.Z;
2262  else if (pt == e2.Top) pt.Z = e2.Top.Z;
2263  else (*m_ZFill)(e1.Bot, e1.Top, e2.Bot, e2.Top, pt);
2264 }
2265 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2266 #endif
2267 
2268  void Clipper::IntersectEdges(TEdge *e1, TEdge *e2, IntPoint &Pt)
2269  {
2270  bool e1Contributing = (e1->OutIdx >= 0);
2271  bool e2Contributing = (e2->OutIdx >= 0);
2272 
2273 #ifdef use_xyz
2274  SetZ(Pt, *e1, *e2);
2275 #endif
2276 
2277 #ifdef use_lines
2278  //if either edge is on an OPEN path ...
2279  if (e1->WindDelta == 0 || e2->WindDelta == 0)
2280  {
2281  //ignore subject-subject open path intersections UNLESS they
2282  //are both open paths, AND they are both 'contributing maximas' ...
2283  if (e1->WindDelta == 0 && e2->WindDelta == 0)
2284  return;
2285 
2286  //if intersecting a subj line with a subj poly ...
2287  else if (e1->PolyTyp == e2->PolyTyp &&
2288  e1->WindDelta != e2->WindDelta && m_ClipType == ctUnion)
2289  {
2290  if (e1->WindDelta == 0)
2291  {
2292  if (e2Contributing)
2293  {
2294  AddOutPt(e1, Pt);
2295  if (e1Contributing)
2296  e1->OutIdx = Unassigned;
2297  }
2298  } else
2299  {
2300  if (e1Contributing)
2301  {
2302  AddOutPt(e2, Pt);
2303  if (e2Contributing)
2304  e2->OutIdx = Unassigned;
2305  }
2306  }
2307  } else if (e1->PolyTyp != e2->PolyTyp)
2308  {
2309  //toggle subj open path OutIdx on/off when Abs(clip.WndCnt) == 1 ...
2310  if ((e1->WindDelta == 0) && abs(e2->WindCnt) == 1 &&
2311  (m_ClipType != ctUnion || e2->WindCnt2 == 0))
2312  {
2313  AddOutPt(e1, Pt);
2314  if (e1Contributing)
2315  e1->OutIdx = Unassigned;
2316  } else if ((e2->WindDelta == 0) && (abs(e1->WindCnt) == 1) &&
2317  (m_ClipType != ctUnion || e1->WindCnt2 == 0))
2318  {
2319  AddOutPt(e2, Pt);
2320  if (e2Contributing)
2321  e2->OutIdx = Unassigned;
2322  }
2323  }
2324  return;
2325  }
2326 #endif
2327 
2328  //update winding counts...
2329  //assumes that e1 will be to the Right of e2 ABOVE the intersection
2330  if (e1->PolyTyp == e2->PolyTyp)
2331  {
2332  if (IsEvenOddFillType(*e1))
2333  {
2334  int oldE1WindCnt = e1->WindCnt;
2335  e1->WindCnt = e2->WindCnt;
2336  e2->WindCnt = oldE1WindCnt;
2337  } else
2338  {
2339  if (e1->WindCnt + e2->WindDelta == 0)
2340  e1->WindCnt = -e1->WindCnt;
2341  else
2342  e1->WindCnt += e2->WindDelta;
2343  if (e2->WindCnt - e1->WindDelta == 0)
2344  e2->WindCnt = -e2->WindCnt;
2345  else
2346  e2->WindCnt -= e1->WindDelta;
2347  }
2348  } else
2349  {
2350  if (!IsEvenOddFillType(*e2))
2351  e1->WindCnt2 += e2->WindDelta;
2352  else
2353  e1->WindCnt2 = (e1->WindCnt2 == 0) ? 1 : 0;
2354  if (!IsEvenOddFillType(*e1))
2355  e2->WindCnt2 -= e1->WindDelta;
2356  else
2357  e2->WindCnt2 = (e2->WindCnt2 == 0) ? 1 : 0;
2358  }
2359 
2360  PolyFillType e1FillType, e2FillType, e1FillType2, e2FillType2;
2361  if (e1->PolyTyp == ptSubject)
2362  {
2363  e1FillType = m_SubjFillType;
2364  e1FillType2 = m_ClipFillType;
2365  } else
2366  {
2367  e1FillType = m_ClipFillType;
2368  e1FillType2 = m_SubjFillType;
2369  }
2370  if (e2->PolyTyp == ptSubject)
2371  {
2372  e2FillType = m_SubjFillType;
2373  e2FillType2 = m_ClipFillType;
2374  } else
2375  {
2376  e2FillType = m_ClipFillType;
2377  e2FillType2 = m_SubjFillType;
2378  }
2379 
2380  cInt e1Wc, e2Wc;
2381  switch (e1FillType)
2382  {
2383  case pftPositive:
2384  e1Wc = e1->WindCnt;
2385  break;
2386  case pftNegative:
2387  e1Wc = -e1->WindCnt;
2388  break;
2389  default:
2390  e1Wc = Abs(e1->WindCnt);
2391  }
2392  switch (e2FillType)
2393  {
2394  case pftPositive:
2395  e2Wc = e2->WindCnt;
2396  break;
2397  case pftNegative:
2398  e2Wc = -e2->WindCnt;
2399  break;
2400  default:
2401  e2Wc = Abs(e2->WindCnt);
2402  }
2403 
2404  if (e1Contributing && e2Contributing)
2405  {
2406  if ((e1Wc != 0 && e1Wc != 1) || (e2Wc != 0 && e2Wc != 1) ||
2407  (e1->PolyTyp != e2->PolyTyp && m_ClipType != ctXor))
2408  {
2409  AddLocalMaxPoly(e1, e2, Pt);
2410  } else
2411  {
2412  AddOutPt(e1, Pt);
2413  AddOutPt(e2, Pt);
2414  SwapSides(*e1, *e2);
2415  SwapPolyIndexes(*e1, *e2);
2416  }
2417  } else if (e1Contributing)
2418  {
2419  if (e2Wc == 0 || e2Wc == 1)
2420  {
2421  AddOutPt(e1, Pt);
2422  SwapSides(*e1, *e2);
2423  SwapPolyIndexes(*e1, *e2);
2424  }
2425  } else if (e2Contributing)
2426  {
2427  if (e1Wc == 0 || e1Wc == 1)
2428  {
2429  AddOutPt(e2, Pt);
2430  SwapSides(*e1, *e2);
2431  SwapPolyIndexes(*e1, *e2);
2432  }
2433  } else if ((e1Wc == 0 || e1Wc == 1) && (e2Wc == 0 || e2Wc == 1))
2434  {
2435  //neither edge is currently contributing ...
2436 
2437  cInt e1Wc2, e2Wc2;
2438  switch (e1FillType2)
2439  {
2440  case pftPositive:
2441  e1Wc2 = e1->WindCnt2;
2442  break;
2443  case pftNegative :
2444  e1Wc2 = -e1->WindCnt2;
2445  break;
2446  default:
2447  e1Wc2 = Abs(e1->WindCnt2);
2448  }
2449  switch (e2FillType2)
2450  {
2451  case pftPositive:
2452  e2Wc2 = e2->WindCnt2;
2453  break;
2454  case pftNegative:
2455  e2Wc2 = -e2->WindCnt2;
2456  break;
2457  default:
2458  e2Wc2 = Abs(e2->WindCnt2);
2459  }
2460 
2461  if (e1->PolyTyp != e2->PolyTyp)
2462  {
2463  AddLocalMinPoly(e1, e2, Pt);
2464  } else if (e1Wc == 1 && e2Wc == 1)
2465  switch (m_ClipType)
2466  {
2467  case ctIntersection:
2468  if (e1Wc2 > 0 && e2Wc2 > 0)
2469  AddLocalMinPoly(e1, e2, Pt);
2470  break;
2471  case ctUnion:
2472  if (e1Wc2 <= 0 && e2Wc2 <= 0)
2473  AddLocalMinPoly(e1, e2, Pt);
2474  break;
2475  case ctDifference:
2476  if (((e1->PolyTyp == ptClip) && (e1Wc2 > 0) && (e2Wc2 > 0)) ||
2477  ((e1->PolyTyp == ptSubject) && (e1Wc2 <= 0) && (e2Wc2 <= 0)))
2478  AddLocalMinPoly(e1, e2, Pt);
2479  break;
2480  case ctXor:
2481  AddLocalMinPoly(e1, e2, Pt);
2482  }
2483  else
2484  SwapSides(*e1, *e2);
2485  }
2486  }
2487 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2488 
2489  void Clipper::SetHoleState(TEdge *e, OutRec *outrec)
2490  {
2491  TEdge *e2 = e->PrevInAEL;
2492  TEdge *eTmp = 0;
2493  while (e2)
2494  {
2495  if (e2->OutIdx >= 0 && e2->WindDelta != 0)
2496  {
2497  if (!eTmp)
2498  eTmp = e2;
2499  else if (eTmp->OutIdx == e2->OutIdx)
2500  eTmp = 0;
2501  }
2502  e2 = e2->PrevInAEL;
2503  }
2504  if (!eTmp)
2505  {
2506  outrec->FirstLeft = 0;
2507  outrec->IsHole = false;
2508  } else
2509  {
2510  outrec->FirstLeft = m_PolyOuts[eTmp->OutIdx];
2511  outrec->IsHole = !outrec->FirstLeft->IsHole;
2512  }
2513  }
2514 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2515 
2516  OutRec *GetLowermostRec(OutRec *outRec1, OutRec *outRec2)
2517  {
2518  //work out which polygon fragment has the correct hole state ...
2519  if (!outRec1->BottomPt)
2520  outRec1->BottomPt = GetBottomPt(outRec1->Pts);
2521  if (!outRec2->BottomPt)
2522  outRec2->BottomPt = GetBottomPt(outRec2->Pts);
2523  OutPt *OutPt1 = outRec1->BottomPt;
2524  OutPt *OutPt2 = outRec2->BottomPt;
2525  if (OutPt1->Pt.Y > OutPt2->Pt.Y)
2526  return outRec1;
2527  else if (OutPt1->Pt.Y < OutPt2->Pt.Y)
2528  return outRec2;
2529  else if (OutPt1->Pt.X < OutPt2->Pt.X)
2530  return outRec1;
2531  else if (OutPt1->Pt.X > OutPt2->Pt.X)
2532  return outRec2;
2533  else if (OutPt1->Next == OutPt1)
2534  return outRec2;
2535  else if (OutPt2->Next == OutPt2)
2536  return outRec1;
2537  else if (FirstIsBottomPt(OutPt1, OutPt2))
2538  return outRec1;
2539  else
2540  return outRec2;
2541  }
2542 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2543 
2544  bool OutRec1RightOfOutRec2(OutRec *outRec1, OutRec *outRec2)
2545  {
2546  do
2547  {
2548  outRec1 = outRec1->FirstLeft;
2549  if (outRec1 == outRec2)
2550  return true;
2551  } while (outRec1);
2552  return false;
2553  }
2554 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2555 
2556  OutRec *Clipper::GetOutRec(int Idx)
2557  {
2558  OutRec *outrec = m_PolyOuts[Idx];
2559  while (outrec != m_PolyOuts[outrec->Idx])
2560  outrec = m_PolyOuts[outrec->Idx];
2561  return outrec;
2562  }
2563 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2564 
2565  void Clipper::AppendPolygon(TEdge *e1, TEdge *e2)
2566  {
2567  //get the start and ends of both output polygons ...
2568  OutRec *outRec1 = m_PolyOuts[e1->OutIdx];
2569  OutRec *outRec2 = m_PolyOuts[e2->OutIdx];
2570 
2571  OutRec *holeStateRec;
2572  if (OutRec1RightOfOutRec2(outRec1, outRec2))
2573  holeStateRec = outRec2;
2574  else if (OutRec1RightOfOutRec2(outRec2, outRec1))
2575  holeStateRec = outRec1;
2576  else
2577  holeStateRec = GetLowermostRec(outRec1, outRec2);
2578 
2579  //get the start and ends of both output polygons and
2580  //join e2 poly onto e1 poly and delete pointers to e2 ...
2581 
2582  OutPt *p1_lft = outRec1->Pts;
2583  OutPt *p1_rt = p1_lft->Prev;
2584  OutPt *p2_lft = outRec2->Pts;
2585  OutPt *p2_rt = p2_lft->Prev;
2586 
2587  //join e2 poly onto e1 poly and delete pointers to e2 ...
2588  if (e1->Side == esLeft)
2589  {
2590  if (e2->Side == esLeft)
2591  {
2592  //z y x a b c
2593  ReversePolyPtLinks(p2_lft);
2594  p2_lft->Next = p1_lft;
2595  p1_lft->Prev = p2_lft;
2596  p1_rt->Next = p2_rt;
2597  p2_rt->Prev = p1_rt;
2598  outRec1->Pts = p2_rt;
2599  } else
2600  {
2601  //x y z a b c
2602  p2_rt->Next = p1_lft;
2603  p1_lft->Prev = p2_rt;
2604  p2_lft->Prev = p1_rt;
2605  p1_rt->Next = p2_lft;
2606  outRec1->Pts = p2_lft;
2607  }
2608  } else
2609  {
2610  if (e2->Side == esRight)
2611  {
2612  //a b c z y x
2613  ReversePolyPtLinks(p2_lft);
2614  p1_rt->Next = p2_rt;
2615  p2_rt->Prev = p1_rt;
2616  p2_lft->Next = p1_lft;
2617  p1_lft->Prev = p2_lft;
2618  } else
2619  {
2620  //a b c x y z
2621  p1_rt->Next = p2_lft;
2622  p2_lft->Prev = p1_rt;
2623  p1_lft->Prev = p2_rt;
2624  p2_rt->Next = p1_lft;
2625  }
2626  }
2627 
2628  outRec1->BottomPt = 0;
2629  if (holeStateRec == outRec2)
2630  {
2631  if (outRec2->FirstLeft != outRec1)
2632  outRec1->FirstLeft = outRec2->FirstLeft;
2633  outRec1->IsHole = outRec2->IsHole;
2634  }
2635  outRec2->Pts = 0;
2636  outRec2->BottomPt = 0;
2637  outRec2->FirstLeft = outRec1;
2638 
2639  int OKIdx = e1->OutIdx;
2640  int ObsoleteIdx = e2->OutIdx;
2641 
2642  e1->OutIdx = Unassigned; //nb: safe because we only get here via AddLocalMaxPoly
2643  e2->OutIdx = Unassigned;
2644 
2645  TEdge *e = m_ActiveEdges;
2646  while (e)
2647  {
2648  if (e->OutIdx == ObsoleteIdx)
2649  {
2650  e->OutIdx = OKIdx;
2651  e->Side = e1->Side;
2652  break;
2653  }
2654  e = e->NextInAEL;
2655  }
2656 
2657  outRec2->Idx = outRec1->Idx;
2658  }
2659 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2660 
2661  OutPt *Clipper::AddOutPt(TEdge *e, const IntPoint &pt)
2662  {
2663  if (e->OutIdx < 0)
2664  {
2665  OutRec *outRec = CreateOutRec();
2666  outRec->IsOpen = (e->WindDelta == 0);
2667  OutPt *newOp = new OutPt;
2668  outRec->Pts = newOp;
2669  newOp->Idx = outRec->Idx;
2670  newOp->Pt = pt;
2671  newOp->Next = newOp;
2672  newOp->Prev = newOp;
2673  if (!outRec->IsOpen)
2674  SetHoleState(e, outRec);
2675  e->OutIdx = outRec->Idx;
2676  return newOp;
2677  } else
2678  {
2679  OutRec *outRec = m_PolyOuts[e->OutIdx];
2680  //OutRec.Pts is the 'Left-most' point & OutRec.Pts.Prev is the 'Right-most'
2681  OutPt *op = outRec->Pts;
2682 
2683  bool ToFront = (e->Side == esLeft);
2684  if (ToFront && (pt == op->Pt))
2685  return op;
2686  else if (!ToFront && (pt == op->Prev->Pt))
2687  return op->Prev;
2688 
2689  OutPt *newOp = new OutPt;
2690  newOp->Idx = outRec->Idx;
2691  newOp->Pt = pt;
2692  newOp->Next = op;
2693  newOp->Prev = op->Prev;
2694  newOp->Prev->Next = newOp;
2695  op->Prev = newOp;
2696  if (ToFront)
2697  outRec->Pts = newOp;
2698  return newOp;
2699  }
2700  }
2701 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2702 
2703  OutPt *Clipper::GetLastOutPt(TEdge *e)
2704  {
2705  OutRec *outRec = m_PolyOuts[e->OutIdx];
2706  if (e->Side == esLeft)
2707  return outRec->Pts;
2708  else
2709  return outRec->Pts->Prev;
2710  }
2711 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2712 
2713  void Clipper::ProcessHorizontals()
2714  {
2715  TEdge *horzEdge;
2716  while (PopEdgeFromSEL(horzEdge))
2717  ProcessHorizontal(horzEdge);
2718  }
2719 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2720 
2721  inline bool IsMinima(TEdge *e)
2722  {
2723  return e && (e->Prev->NextInLML != e) && (e->Next->NextInLML != e);
2724  }
2725 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2726 
2727  inline bool IsMaxima(TEdge *e, const cInt Y)
2728  {
2729  return e && e->Top.Y == Y && !e->NextInLML;
2730  }
2731 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2732 
2733  inline bool IsIntermediate(TEdge *e, const cInt Y)
2734  {
2735  return e->Top.Y == Y && e->NextInLML;
2736  }
2737 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2738 
2739  TEdge *GetMaximaPair(TEdge *e)
2740  {
2741  if ((e->Next->Top == e->Top) && !e->Next->NextInLML)
2742  return e->Next;
2743  else if ((e->Prev->Top == e->Top) && !e->Prev->NextInLML)
2744  return e->Prev;
2745  else
2746  return 0;
2747  }
2748 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2749 
2750  TEdge *GetMaximaPairEx(TEdge *e)
2751  {
2752  //as GetMaximaPair() but returns 0 if MaxPair isn't in AEL (unless it's horizontal)
2753  TEdge *result = GetMaximaPair(e);
2754  if (result && (result->OutIdx == Skip ||
2755  (result->NextInAEL == result->PrevInAEL && !IsHorizontal(*result))))
2756  return 0;
2757  return result;
2758  }
2759 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2760 
2761  void Clipper::SwapPositionsInSEL(TEdge *Edge1, TEdge *Edge2)
2762  {
2763  if (!(Edge1->NextInSEL) && !(Edge1->PrevInSEL))
2764  return;
2765  if (!(Edge2->NextInSEL) && !(Edge2->PrevInSEL))
2766  return;
2767 
2768  if (Edge1->NextInSEL == Edge2)
2769  {
2770  TEdge *Next = Edge2->NextInSEL;
2771  if (Next)
2772  Next->PrevInSEL = Edge1;
2773  TEdge *Prev = Edge1->PrevInSEL;
2774  if (Prev)
2775  Prev->NextInSEL = Edge2;
2776  Edge2->PrevInSEL = Prev;
2777  Edge2->NextInSEL = Edge1;
2778  Edge1->PrevInSEL = Edge2;
2779  Edge1->NextInSEL = Next;
2780  } else if (Edge2->NextInSEL == Edge1)
2781  {
2782  TEdge *Next = Edge1->NextInSEL;
2783  if (Next)
2784  Next->PrevInSEL = Edge2;
2785  TEdge *Prev = Edge2->PrevInSEL;
2786  if (Prev)
2787  Prev->NextInSEL = Edge1;
2788  Edge1->PrevInSEL = Prev;
2789  Edge1->NextInSEL = Edge2;
2790  Edge2->PrevInSEL = Edge1;
2791  Edge2->NextInSEL = Next;
2792  } else
2793  {
2794  TEdge *Next = Edge1->NextInSEL;
2795  TEdge *Prev = Edge1->PrevInSEL;
2796  Edge1->NextInSEL = Edge2->NextInSEL;
2797  if (Edge1->NextInSEL)
2798  Edge1->NextInSEL->PrevInSEL = Edge1;
2799  Edge1->PrevInSEL = Edge2->PrevInSEL;
2800  if (Edge1->PrevInSEL)
2801  Edge1->PrevInSEL->NextInSEL = Edge1;
2802  Edge2->NextInSEL = Next;
2803  if (Edge2->NextInSEL)
2804  Edge2->NextInSEL->PrevInSEL = Edge2;
2805  Edge2->PrevInSEL = Prev;
2806  if (Edge2->PrevInSEL)
2807  Edge2->PrevInSEL->NextInSEL = Edge2;
2808  }
2809 
2810  if (!Edge1->PrevInSEL)
2811  m_SortedEdges = Edge1;
2812  else if (!Edge2->PrevInSEL)
2813  m_SortedEdges = Edge2;
2814  }
2815 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2816 
2817  TEdge *GetNextInAEL(TEdge *e, Direction dir)
2818  {
2819  return dir == dLeftToRight ? e->NextInAEL : e->PrevInAEL;
2820  }
2821 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2822 
2823  void GetHorzDirection(TEdge &HorzEdge, Direction &Dir, cInt &Left, cInt &Right)
2824  {
2825  if (HorzEdge.Bot.X < HorzEdge.Top.X)
2826  {
2827  Left = HorzEdge.Bot.X;
2828  Right = HorzEdge.Top.X;
2829  Dir = dLeftToRight;
2830  } else
2831  {
2832  Left = HorzEdge.Top.X;
2833  Right = HorzEdge.Bot.X;
2834  Dir = dRightToLeft;
2835  }
2836  }
2837 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
2838 
2839 /*******************************************************************************
2840 * Notes: Horizontal edges (HEs) at scanline intersections (ie at the Top or *
2841 * Bottom of a scanbeam) are processed as if layered. The order in which HEs *
2842 * are processed doesn't matter. HEs intersect with other HE Bot.Xs only [#] *
2843 * (or they could intersect with Top.Xs only, ie EITHER Bot.Xs OR Top.Xs), *
2844 * and with other non-horizontal edges [*]. Once these intersections are *
2845 * processed, intermediate HEs then 'promote' the Edge above (NextInLML) into *
2846 * the AEL. These 'promoted' edges may in turn intersect [%] with other HEs. *
2847 *******************************************************************************/
2848 
2849  void Clipper::ProcessHorizontal(TEdge *horzEdge)
2850  {
2851  Direction dir;
2852  cInt horzLeft, horzRight;
2853  bool IsOpen = (horzEdge->WindDelta == 0);
2854 
2855  GetHorzDirection(*horzEdge, dir, horzLeft, horzRight);
2856 
2857  TEdge *eLastHorz = horzEdge, *eMaxPair = 0;
2858  while (eLastHorz->NextInLML && IsHorizontal(*eLastHorz->NextInLML))
2859  eLastHorz = eLastHorz->NextInLML;
2860  if (!eLastHorz->NextInLML)
2861  eMaxPair = GetMaximaPair(eLastHorz);
2862 
2863  MaximaList::const_iterator maxIt;
2864  MaximaList::const_reverse_iterator maxRit;
2865  if (m_Maxima.size() > 0)
2866  {
2867  //get the first maxima in range (X) ...
2868  if (dir == dLeftToRight)
2869  {
2870  maxIt = m_Maxima.begin();
2871  while (maxIt != m_Maxima.end() && *maxIt <= horzEdge->Bot.X)
2872  maxIt++;
2873  if (maxIt != m_Maxima.end() && *maxIt >= eLastHorz->Top.X)
2874  maxIt = m_Maxima.end();
2875  } else
2876  {
2877  maxRit = m_Maxima.rbegin();
2878  while (maxRit != m_Maxima.rend() && *maxRit > horzEdge->Bot.X)
2879  maxRit++;
2880  if (maxRit != m_Maxima.rend() && *maxRit <= eLastHorz->Top.X)
2881  maxRit = m_Maxima.rend();
2882  }
2883  }
2884 
2885  OutPt *op1 = 0;
2886 
2887  for (;;) //loop through consec. horizontal edges
2888  {
2889 
2890  bool IsLastHorz = (horzEdge == eLastHorz);
2891  TEdge *e = GetNextInAEL(horzEdge, dir);
2892  while (e)
2893  {
2894 
2895  //this code block inserts extra coords into horizontal edges (in output
2896  //polygons) whereever maxima touch these horizontal edges. This helps
2897  //'simplifying' polygons (ie if the Simplify property is set).
2898  if (m_Maxima.size() > 0)
2899  {
2900  if (dir == dLeftToRight)
2901  {
2902  while (maxIt != m_Maxima.end() && *maxIt < e->Curr.X)
2903  {
2904  if (horzEdge->OutIdx >= 0 && !IsOpen)
2905  AddOutPt(horzEdge, IntPoint(*maxIt, horzEdge->Bot.Y));
2906  maxIt++;
2907  }
2908  } else
2909  {
2910  while (maxRit != m_Maxima.rend() && *maxRit > e->Curr.X)
2911  {
2912  if (horzEdge->OutIdx >= 0 && !IsOpen)
2913  AddOutPt(horzEdge, IntPoint(*maxRit, horzEdge->Bot.Y));
2914  maxRit++;
2915  }
2916  }
2917  };
2918 
2919  if ((dir == dLeftToRight && e->Curr.X > horzRight) ||
2920  (dir == dRightToLeft && e->Curr.X < horzLeft))
2921  break;
2922 
2923  //Also break if we've got to the end of an intermediate horizontal edge ...
2924  //nb: Smaller Dx's are to the right of larger Dx's ABOVE the horizontal.
2925  if (e->Curr.X == horzEdge->Top.X && horzEdge->NextInLML &&
2926  e->Dx < horzEdge->NextInLML->Dx)
2927  break;
2928 
2929  if (horzEdge->OutIdx >= 0 && !IsOpen) //note: may be done multiple times
2930  {
2931 #ifdef use_xyz
2932  if (dir == dLeftToRight) SetZ(e->Curr, *horzEdge, *e);
2933  else SetZ(e->Curr, *e, *horzEdge);
2934 #endif
2935  op1 = AddOutPt(horzEdge, e->Curr);
2936  TEdge *eNextHorz = m_SortedEdges;
2937  while (eNextHorz)
2938  {
2939  if (eNextHorz->OutIdx >= 0 &&
2940  HorzSegmentsOverlap(horzEdge->Bot.X,
2941  horzEdge->Top.X, eNextHorz->Bot.X, eNextHorz->Top.X))
2942  {
2943  OutPt *op2 = GetLastOutPt(eNextHorz);
2944  AddJoin(op2, op1, eNextHorz->Top);
2945  }
2946  eNextHorz = eNextHorz->NextInSEL;
2947  }
2948  AddGhostJoin(op1, horzEdge->Bot);
2949  }
2950 
2951  //OK, so far we're still in range of the horizontal Edge but make sure
2952  //we're at the last of consec. horizontals when matching with eMaxPair
2953  if (e == eMaxPair && IsLastHorz)
2954  {
2955  if (horzEdge->OutIdx >= 0)
2956  AddLocalMaxPoly(horzEdge, eMaxPair, horzEdge->Top);
2957  DeleteFromAEL(horzEdge);
2958  DeleteFromAEL(eMaxPair);
2959  return;
2960  }
2961 
2962  if (dir == dLeftToRight)
2963  {
2964  IntPoint Pt = IntPoint(e->Curr.X, horzEdge->Curr.Y);
2965  IntersectEdges(horzEdge, e, Pt);
2966  } else
2967  {
2968  IntPoint Pt = IntPoint(e->Curr.X, horzEdge->Curr.Y);
2969  IntersectEdges(e, horzEdge, Pt);
2970  }
2971  TEdge *eNext = GetNextInAEL(e, dir);
2972  SwapPositionsInAEL(horzEdge, e);
2973  e = eNext;
2974  } //end while(e)
2975 
2976  //Break out of loop if HorzEdge.NextInLML is not also horizontal ...
2977  if (!horzEdge->NextInLML || !IsHorizontal(*horzEdge->NextInLML))
2978  break;
2979 
2980  UpdateEdgeIntoAEL(horzEdge);
2981  if (horzEdge->OutIdx >= 0)
2982  AddOutPt(horzEdge, horzEdge->Bot);
2983  GetHorzDirection(*horzEdge, dir, horzLeft, horzRight);
2984 
2985  } //end for (;;)
2986 
2987  if (horzEdge->OutIdx >= 0 && !op1)
2988  {
2989  op1 = GetLastOutPt(horzEdge);
2990  TEdge *eNextHorz = m_SortedEdges;
2991  while (eNextHorz)
2992  {
2993  if (eNextHorz->OutIdx >= 0 &&
2994  HorzSegmentsOverlap(horzEdge->Bot.X,
2995  horzEdge->Top.X, eNextHorz->Bot.X, eNextHorz->Top.X))
2996  {
2997  OutPt *op2 = GetLastOutPt(eNextHorz);
2998  AddJoin(op2, op1, eNextHorz->Top);
2999  }
3000  eNextHorz = eNextHorz->NextInSEL;
3001  }
3002  AddGhostJoin(op1, horzEdge->Top);
3003  }
3004 
3005  if (horzEdge->NextInLML)
3006  {
3007  if (horzEdge->OutIdx >= 0)
3008  {
3009  op1 = AddOutPt(horzEdge, horzEdge->Top);
3010  UpdateEdgeIntoAEL(horzEdge);
3011  if (horzEdge->WindDelta == 0)
3012  return;
3013  //nb: HorzEdge is no longer horizontal here
3014  TEdge *ePrev = horzEdge->PrevInAEL;
3015  TEdge *eNext = horzEdge->NextInAEL;
3016  if (ePrev && ePrev->Curr.X == horzEdge->Bot.X &&
3017  ePrev->Curr.Y == horzEdge->Bot.Y && ePrev->WindDelta != 0 &&
3018  (ePrev->OutIdx >= 0 && ePrev->Curr.Y > ePrev->Top.Y &&
3019  SlopesEqual(*horzEdge, *ePrev, m_UseFullRange)))
3020  {
3021  OutPt *op2 = AddOutPt(ePrev, horzEdge->Bot);
3022  AddJoin(op1, op2, horzEdge->Top);
3023  } else if (eNext && eNext->Curr.X == horzEdge->Bot.X &&
3024  eNext->Curr.Y == horzEdge->Bot.Y && eNext->WindDelta != 0 &&
3025  eNext->OutIdx >= 0 && eNext->Curr.Y > eNext->Top.Y &&
3026  SlopesEqual(*horzEdge, *eNext, m_UseFullRange))
3027  {
3028  OutPt *op2 = AddOutPt(eNext, horzEdge->Bot);
3029  AddJoin(op1, op2, horzEdge->Top);
3030  }
3031  } else
3032  UpdateEdgeIntoAEL(horzEdge);
3033  } else
3034  {
3035  if (horzEdge->OutIdx >= 0)
3036  AddOutPt(horzEdge, horzEdge->Top);
3037  DeleteFromAEL(horzEdge);
3038  }
3039  }
3040 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3041 
3042  bool Clipper::ProcessIntersections(const cInt topY)
3043  {
3044  if (!m_ActiveEdges)
3045  return true;
3046  try
3047  {
3048  BuildIntersectList(topY);
3049  size_t IlSize = m_IntersectList.size();
3050  if (IlSize == 0)
3051  return true;
3052  if (IlSize == 1 || FixupIntersectionOrder())
3053  ProcessIntersectList();
3054  else
3055  return false;
3056  }
3057  catch (...)
3058  {
3059  m_SortedEdges = 0;
3060  DisposeIntersectNodes();
3061  throw clipperException("ProcessIntersections error");
3062  }
3063  m_SortedEdges = 0;
3064  return true;
3065  }
3066 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3067 
3068  void Clipper::DisposeIntersectNodes()
3069  {
3070  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_IntersectList.size(); ++i)
3071  delete m_IntersectList[i];
3072  m_IntersectList.clear();
3073  }
3074 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3075 
3076  void Clipper::BuildIntersectList(const cInt topY)
3077  {
3078  if (!m_ActiveEdges)
3079  return;
3080 
3081  //prepare for sorting ...
3082  TEdge *e = m_ActiveEdges;
3083  m_SortedEdges = e;
3084  while (e)
3085  {
3086  e->PrevInSEL = e->PrevInAEL;
3087  e->NextInSEL = e->NextInAEL;
3088  e->Curr.X = TopX(*e, topY);
3089  e = e->NextInAEL;
3090  }
3091 
3092  //bubblesort ...
3093  bool isModified;
3094  do
3095  {
3096  isModified = false;
3097  e = m_SortedEdges;
3098  while (e->NextInSEL)
3099  {
3100  TEdge *eNext = e->NextInSEL;
3101  IntPoint Pt;
3102  if (e->Curr.X > eNext->Curr.X)
3103  {
3104  IntersectPoint(*e, *eNext, Pt);
3105  if (Pt.Y < topY)
3106  Pt = IntPoint(TopX(*e, topY), topY);
3107  IntersectNode *newNode = new IntersectNode;
3108  newNode->Edge1 = e;
3109  newNode->Edge2 = eNext;
3110  newNode->Pt = Pt;
3111  m_IntersectList.push_back(newNode);
3112 
3113  SwapPositionsInSEL(e, eNext);
3114  isModified = true;
3115  } else
3116  e = eNext;
3117  }
3118  if (e->PrevInSEL)
3119  e->PrevInSEL->NextInSEL = 0;
3120  else
3121  break;
3122  } while (isModified);
3123  m_SortedEdges = 0; //important
3124  }
3125 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3126 
3127 
3128  void Clipper::ProcessIntersectList()
3129  {
3130  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_IntersectList.size(); ++i)
3131  {
3132  IntersectNode *iNode = m_IntersectList[i];
3133  {
3134  IntersectEdges(iNode->Edge1, iNode->Edge2, iNode->Pt);
3135  SwapPositionsInAEL(iNode->Edge1, iNode->Edge2);
3136  }
3137  delete iNode;
3138  }
3139  m_IntersectList.clear();
3140  }
3141 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3142 
3143  bool IntersectListSort(IntersectNode *node1, IntersectNode *node2)
3144  {
3145  return node2->Pt.Y < node1->Pt.Y;
3146  }
3147 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3148 
3149  inline bool EdgesAdjacent(const IntersectNode &inode)
3150  {
3151  return (inode.Edge1->NextInSEL == inode.Edge2) ||
3152  (inode.Edge1->PrevInSEL == inode.Edge2);
3153  }
3154 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3155 
3156  bool Clipper::FixupIntersectionOrder()
3157  {
3158  //pre-condition: intersections are sorted Bottom-most first.
3159  //Now it's crucial that intersections are made only between adjacent edges,
3160  //so to ensure this the order of intersections may need adjusting ...
3161  CopyAELToSEL();
3162  std::sort(m_IntersectList.begin(), m_IntersectList.end(), IntersectListSort);
3163  size_t cnt = m_IntersectList.size();
3164  for (size_t i = 0; i < cnt; ++i)
3165  {
3166  if (!EdgesAdjacent(*m_IntersectList[i]))
3167  {
3168  size_t j = i + 1;
3169  while (j < cnt && !EdgesAdjacent(*m_IntersectList[j]))
3170  j++;
3171  if (j == cnt)
3172  return false;
3173  std::swap(m_IntersectList[i], m_IntersectList[j]);
3174  }
3175  SwapPositionsInSEL(m_IntersectList[i]->Edge1, m_IntersectList[i]->Edge2);
3176  }
3177  return true;
3178  }
3179 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3180 
3181  void Clipper::DoMaxima(TEdge *e)
3182  {
3183  TEdge *eMaxPair = GetMaximaPairEx(e);
3184  if (!eMaxPair)
3185  {
3186  if (e->OutIdx >= 0)
3187  AddOutPt(e, e->Top);
3188  DeleteFromAEL(e);
3189  return;
3190  }
3191 
3192  TEdge *eNext = e->NextInAEL;
3193  while (eNext && eNext != eMaxPair)
3194  {
3195  IntersectEdges(e, eNext, e->Top);
3196  SwapPositionsInAEL(e, eNext);
3197  eNext = e->NextInAEL;
3198  }
3199 
3200  if (e->OutIdx == Unassigned && eMaxPair->OutIdx == Unassigned)
3201  {
3202  DeleteFromAEL(e);
3203  DeleteFromAEL(eMaxPair);
3204  } else if (e->OutIdx >= 0 && eMaxPair->OutIdx >= 0)
3205  {
3206  if (e->OutIdx >= 0)
3207  AddLocalMaxPoly(e, eMaxPair, e->Top);
3208  DeleteFromAEL(e);
3209  DeleteFromAEL(eMaxPair);
3210  }
3211 #ifdef use_lines
3212  else if (e->WindDelta == 0)
3213  {
3214  if (e->OutIdx >= 0)
3215  {
3216  AddOutPt(e, e->Top);
3217  e->OutIdx = Unassigned;
3218  }
3219  DeleteFromAEL(e);
3220 
3221  if (eMaxPair->OutIdx >= 0)
3222  {
3223  AddOutPt(eMaxPair, e->Top);
3224  eMaxPair->OutIdx = Unassigned;
3225  }
3226  DeleteFromAEL(eMaxPair);
3227  }
3228 #endif
3229  else
3230  throw clipperException("DoMaxima error");
3231  }
3232 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3233 
3234  void Clipper::ProcessEdgesAtTopOfScanbeam(const cInt topY)
3235  {
3236  TEdge *e = m_ActiveEdges;
3237  while (e)
3238  {
3239  //1. process maxima, treating them as if they're 'bent' horizontal edges,
3240  // but exclude maxima with horizontal edges. nb: e can't be a horizontal.
3241  bool IsMaximaEdge = IsMaxima(e, topY);
3242 
3243  if (IsMaximaEdge)
3244  {
3245  TEdge *eMaxPair = GetMaximaPairEx(e);
3246  IsMaximaEdge = (!eMaxPair || !IsHorizontal(*eMaxPair));
3247  }
3248 
3249  if (IsMaximaEdge)
3250  {
3251  if (m_StrictSimple)
3252  m_Maxima.push_back(e->Top.X);
3253  TEdge *ePrev = e->PrevInAEL;
3254  DoMaxima(e);
3255  if (!ePrev)
3256  e = m_ActiveEdges;
3257  else
3258  e = ePrev->NextInAEL;
3259  } else
3260  {
3261  //2. promote horizontal edges, otherwise update Curr.X and Curr.Y ...
3262  if (IsIntermediate(e, topY) && IsHorizontal(*e->NextInLML))
3263  {
3264  UpdateEdgeIntoAEL(e);
3265  if (e->OutIdx >= 0)
3266  AddOutPt(e, e->Bot);
3267  AddEdgeToSEL(e);
3268  } else
3269  {
3270  e->Curr.X = TopX(*e, topY);
3271  e->Curr.Y = topY;
3272 #ifdef use_xyz
3273  e->Curr.Z = topY == e->Top.Y ? e->Top.Z : (topY == e->Bot.Y ? e->Bot.Z : 0);
3274 #endif
3275  }
3276 
3277  //When StrictlySimple and 'e' is being touched by another edge, then
3278  //make sure both edges have a vertex here ...
3279  if (m_StrictSimple)
3280  {
3281  TEdge *ePrev = e->PrevInAEL;
3282  if ((e->OutIdx >= 0) && (e->WindDelta != 0) && ePrev && (ePrev->OutIdx >= 0) &&
3283  (ePrev->Curr.X == e->Curr.X) && (ePrev->WindDelta != 0))
3284  {
3285  IntPoint pt = e->Curr;
3286 #ifdef use_xyz
3287  SetZ(pt, *ePrev, *e);
3288 #endif
3289  OutPt *op = AddOutPt(ePrev, pt);
3290  OutPt *op2 = AddOutPt(e, pt);
3291  AddJoin(op, op2, pt); //StrictlySimple (type-3) join
3292  }
3293  }
3294 
3295  e = e->NextInAEL;
3296  }
3297  }
3298 
3299  //3. Process horizontals at the Top of the scanbeam ...
3300  m_Maxima.sort();
3301  ProcessHorizontals();
3302  m_Maxima.clear();
3303 
3304  //4. Promote intermediate vertices ...
3305  e = m_ActiveEdges;
3306  while (e)
3307  {
3308  if (IsIntermediate(e, topY))
3309  {
3310  OutPt *op = 0;
3311  if (e->OutIdx >= 0)
3312  op = AddOutPt(e, e->Top);
3313  UpdateEdgeIntoAEL(e);
3314 
3315  //if output polygons share an edge, they'll need joining later ...
3316  TEdge *ePrev = e->PrevInAEL;
3317  TEdge *eNext = e->NextInAEL;
3318  if (ePrev && ePrev->Curr.X == e->Bot.X &&
3319  ePrev->Curr.Y == e->Bot.Y && op &&
3320  ePrev->OutIdx >= 0 && ePrev->Curr.Y > ePrev->Top.Y &&
3321  SlopesEqual(e->Curr, e->Top, ePrev->Curr, ePrev->Top, m_UseFullRange) &&
3322  (e->WindDelta != 0) && (ePrev->WindDelta != 0))
3323  {
3324  OutPt *op2 = AddOutPt(ePrev, e->Bot);
3325  AddJoin(op, op2, e->Top);
3326  } else if (eNext && eNext->Curr.X == e->Bot.X &&
3327  eNext->Curr.Y == e->Bot.Y && op &&
3328  eNext->OutIdx >= 0 && eNext->Curr.Y > eNext->Top.Y &&
3329  SlopesEqual(e->Curr, e->Top, eNext->Curr, eNext->Top, m_UseFullRange) &&
3330  (e->WindDelta != 0) && (eNext->WindDelta != 0))
3331  {
3332  OutPt *op2 = AddOutPt(eNext, e->Bot);
3333  AddJoin(op, op2, e->Top);
3334  }
3335  }
3336  e = e->NextInAEL;
3337  }
3338  }
3339 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3340 
3341  void Clipper::FixupOutPolyline(OutRec &outrec)
3342  {
3343  OutPt *pp = outrec.Pts;
3344  OutPt *lastPP = pp->Prev;
3345  while (pp != lastPP)
3346  {
3347  pp = pp->Next;
3348  if (pp->Pt == pp->Prev->Pt)
3349  {
3350  if (pp == lastPP)
3351  lastPP = pp->Prev;
3352  OutPt *tmpPP = pp->Prev;
3353  tmpPP->Next = pp->Next;
3354  pp->Next->Prev = tmpPP;
3355  delete pp;
3356  pp = tmpPP;
3357  }
3358  }
3359 
3360  if (pp == pp->Prev)
3361  {
3362  DisposeOutPts(pp);
3363  outrec.Pts = 0;
3364  return;
3365  }
3366  }
3367 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3368 
3369  void Clipper::FixupOutPolygon(OutRec &outrec)
3370  {
3371  //FixupOutPolygon() - removes duplicate points and simplifies consecutive
3372  //parallel edges by removing the middle vertex.
3373  OutPt *lastOK = 0;
3374  outrec.BottomPt = 0;
3375  OutPt *pp = outrec.Pts;
3376  bool preserveCol = m_PreserveCollinear || m_StrictSimple;
3377 
3378  for (;;)
3379  {
3380  if (pp->Prev == pp || pp->Prev == pp->Next)
3381  {
3382  DisposeOutPts(pp);
3383  outrec.Pts = 0;
3384  return;
3385  }
3386 
3387  //test for duplicate points and collinear edges ...
3388  if ((pp->Pt == pp->Next->Pt) || (pp->Pt == pp->Prev->Pt) ||
3389  (SlopesEqual(pp->Prev->Pt, pp->Pt, pp->Next->Pt, m_UseFullRange) &&
3390  (!preserveCol || !Pt2IsBetweenPt1AndPt3(pp->Prev->Pt, pp->Pt, pp->Next->Pt))))
3391  {
3392  lastOK = 0;
3393  OutPt *tmp = pp;
3394  pp->Prev->Next = pp->Next;
3395  pp->Next->Prev = pp->Prev;
3396  pp = pp->Prev;
3397  delete tmp;
3398  } else if (pp == lastOK)
3399  break;
3400  else
3401  {
3402  if (!lastOK)
3403  lastOK = pp;
3404  pp = pp->Next;
3405  }
3406  }
3407  outrec.Pts = pp;
3408  }
3409 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3410 
3411  int PointCount(OutPt *Pts)
3412  {
3413  if (!Pts)
3414  return 0;
3415  int result = 0;
3416  OutPt *p = Pts;
3417  do
3418  {
3419  result++;
3420  p = p->Next;
3421  } while (p != Pts);
3422  return result;
3423  }
3424 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3425 
3426  void Clipper::BuildResult(Paths &polys)
3427  {
3428  polys.reserve(m_PolyOuts.size());
3429  for (PolyOutList::size_type i = 0; i < m_PolyOuts.size(); ++i)
3430  {
3431  if (!m_PolyOuts[i]->Pts)
3432  continue;
3433  Path pg;
3434  OutPt *p = m_PolyOuts[i]->Pts->Prev;
3435  int cnt = PointCount(p);
3436  if (cnt < 2)
3437  continue;
3438  pg.reserve(cnt);
3439  for (int i = 0; i < cnt; ++i)
3440  {
3441  pg.push_back(p->Pt);
3442  p = p->Prev;
3443  }
3444  polys.push_back(pg);
3445  }
3446  }
3447 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3448 
3449  void Clipper::BuildResult2(PolyTree &polytree)
3450  {
3451  polytree.Clear();
3452  polytree.AllNodes.reserve(m_PolyOuts.size());
3453  //add each output polygon/contour to polytree ...
3454  for (PolyOutList::size_type i = 0; i < m_PolyOuts.size(); i++)
3455  {
3456  OutRec *outRec = m_PolyOuts[i];
3457  int cnt = PointCount(outRec->Pts);
3458  if ((outRec->IsOpen && cnt < 2) || (!outRec->IsOpen && cnt < 3))
3459  continue;
3460  FixHoleLinkage(*outRec);
3461  PolyNode *pn = new PolyNode();
3462  //nb: polytree takes ownership of all the PolyNodes
3463  polytree.AllNodes.push_back(pn);
3464  outRec->PolyNd = pn;
3465  pn->Parent = 0;
3466  pn->Index = 0;
3467  pn->Contour.reserve(cnt);
3468  OutPt *op = outRec->Pts->Prev;
3469  for (int j = 0; j < cnt; j++)
3470  {
3471  pn->Contour.push_back(op->Pt);
3472  op = op->Prev;
3473  }
3474  }
3475 
3476  //fixup PolyNode links etc ...
3477  polytree.Childs.reserve(m_PolyOuts.size());
3478  for (PolyOutList::size_type i = 0; i < m_PolyOuts.size(); i++)
3479  {
3480  OutRec *outRec = m_PolyOuts[i];
3481  if (!outRec->PolyNd)
3482  continue;
3483  if (outRec->IsOpen)
3484  {
3485  outRec->PolyNd->m_IsOpen = true;
3486  polytree.AddChild(*outRec->PolyNd);
3487  } else if (outRec->FirstLeft && outRec->FirstLeft->PolyNd)
3488  outRec->FirstLeft->PolyNd->AddChild(*outRec->PolyNd);
3489  else
3490  polytree.AddChild(*outRec->PolyNd);
3491  }
3492  }
3493 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3494 
3495  void SwapIntersectNodes(IntersectNode &int1, IntersectNode &int2)
3496  {
3497  //just swap the contents (because fIntersectNodes is a single-linked-list)
3498  IntersectNode inode = int1; //gets a copy of Int1
3499  int1.Edge1 = int2.Edge1;
3500  int1.Edge2 = int2.Edge2;
3501  int1.Pt = int2.Pt;
3502  int2.Edge1 = inode.Edge1;
3503  int2.Edge2 = inode.Edge2;
3504  int2.Pt = inode.Pt;
3505  }
3506 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3507 
3508  inline bool E2InsertsBeforeE1(TEdge &e1, TEdge &e2)
3509  {
3510  if (e2.Curr.X == e1.Curr.X)
3511  {
3512  if (e2.Top.Y > e1.Top.Y)
3513  return e2.Top.X < TopX(e1, e2.Top.Y);
3514  else
3515  return e1.Top.X > TopX(e2, e1.Top.Y);
3516  } else
3517  return e2.Curr.X < e1.Curr.X;
3518  }
3519 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3520 
3521  bool GetOverlap(const cInt a1, const cInt a2, const cInt b1, const cInt b2,
3522  cInt &Left, cInt &Right)
3523  {
3524  if (a1 < a2)
3525  {
3526  if (b1 < b2)
3527  {
3528  Left = std::max(a1, b1);
3529  Right = std::min(a2, b2);
3530  } else
3531  {
3532  Left = std::max(a1, b2);
3533  Right = std::min(a2, b1);
3534  }
3535  } else
3536  {
3537  if (b1 < b2)
3538  {
3539  Left = std::max(a2, b1);
3540  Right = std::min(a1, b2);
3541  } else
3542  {
3543  Left = std::max(a2, b2);
3544  Right = std::min(a1, b1);
3545  }
3546  }
3547  return Left < Right;
3548  }
3549 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3550 
3551  inline void UpdateOutPtIdxs(OutRec &outrec)
3552  {
3553  OutPt *op = outrec.Pts;
3554  do
3555  {
3556  op->Idx = outrec.Idx;
3557  op = op->Prev;
3558  } while (op != outrec.Pts);
3559  }
3560 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3561 
3562  void Clipper::InsertEdgeIntoAEL(TEdge *edge, TEdge *startEdge)
3563  {
3564  if (!m_ActiveEdges)
3565  {
3566  edge->PrevInAEL = 0;
3567  edge->NextInAEL = 0;
3568  m_ActiveEdges = edge;
3569  } else if (!startEdge && E2InsertsBeforeE1(*m_ActiveEdges, *edge))
3570  {
3571  edge->PrevInAEL = 0;
3572  edge->NextInAEL = m_ActiveEdges;
3573  m_ActiveEdges->PrevInAEL = edge;
3574  m_ActiveEdges = edge;
3575  } else
3576  {
3577  if (!startEdge)
3578  startEdge = m_ActiveEdges;
3579  while (startEdge->NextInAEL &&
3580  !E2InsertsBeforeE1(*startEdge->NextInAEL, *edge))
3581  startEdge = startEdge->NextInAEL;
3582  edge->NextInAEL = startEdge->NextInAEL;
3583  if (startEdge->NextInAEL)
3584  startEdge->NextInAEL->PrevInAEL = edge;
3585  edge->PrevInAEL = startEdge;
3586  startEdge->NextInAEL = edge;
3587  }
3588  }
3589 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
3590 
3591  OutPt *DupOutPt(OutPt *outPt, bool InsertAfter)
3592  {
3593  OutPt *result = new OutPt;
3594  result->Pt = outPt->Pt;
3595  result->Idx = outPt->Idx;
3596  if (InsertAfter)
3597  {
3598  result->Next = outPt->Next;
3599  result->Prev = outPt;
3600  outPt->Next->Prev = result;
3601  outPt->Next = result;
3602  } else
3603  {
3604  result->Prev = outPt->Prev;
3605  result->Next = outPt;
3606  outPt->Prev->Next = result;
3607  outPt->Prev = result;
3608  }
3609  return result;
3610  }
3611 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3612 
3613  bool JoinHorz(OutPt *op1, OutPt *op1b, OutPt *op2, OutPt *op2b,
3614  const IntPoint Pt, bool DiscardLeft)
3615  {
3616  Direction Dir1 = (op1->Pt.X > op1b->Pt.X ? dRightToLeft : dLeftToRight);
3617  Direction Dir2 = (op2->Pt.X > op2b->Pt.X ? dRightToLeft : dLeftToRight);
3618  if (Dir1 == Dir2)
3619  return false;
3620 
3621  //When DiscardLeft, we want Op1b to be on the Left of Op1, otherwise we
3622  //want Op1b to be on the Right. (And likewise with Op2 and Op2b.)
3623  //So, to facilitate this while inserting Op1b and Op2b ...
3624  //when DiscardLeft, make sure we're AT or RIGHT of Pt before adding Op1b,
3625  //otherwise make sure we're AT or LEFT of Pt. (Likewise with Op2b.)
3626  if (Dir1 == dLeftToRight)
3627  {
3628  while (op1->Next->Pt.X <= Pt.X &&
3629  op1->Next->Pt.X >= op1->Pt.X && op1->Next->Pt.Y == Pt.Y)
3630  op1 = op1->Next;
3631  if (DiscardLeft && (op1->Pt.X != Pt.X))
3632  op1 = op1->Next;
3633  op1b = DupOutPt(op1, !DiscardLeft);
3634  if (op1b->Pt != Pt)
3635  {
3636  op1 = op1b;
3637  op1->Pt = Pt;
3638  op1b = DupOutPt(op1, !DiscardLeft);
3639  }
3640  } else
3641  {
3642  while (op1->Next->Pt.X >= Pt.X &&
3643  op1->Next->Pt.X <= op1->Pt.X && op1->Next->Pt.Y == Pt.Y)
3644  op1 = op1->Next;
3645  if (!DiscardLeft && (op1->Pt.X != Pt.X))
3646  op1 = op1->Next;
3647  op1b = DupOutPt(op1, DiscardLeft);
3648  if (op1b->Pt != Pt)
3649  {
3650  op1 = op1b;
3651  op1->Pt = Pt;
3652  op1b = DupOutPt(op1, DiscardLeft);
3653  }
3654  }
3655 
3656  if (Dir2 == dLeftToRight)
3657  {
3658  while (op2->Next->Pt.X <= Pt.X &&
3659  op2->Next->Pt.X >= op2->Pt.X && op2->Next->Pt.Y == Pt.Y)
3660  op2 = op2->Next;
3661  if (DiscardLeft && (op2->Pt.X != Pt.X))
3662  op2 = op2->Next;
3663  op2b = DupOutPt(op2, !DiscardLeft);
3664  if (op2b->Pt != Pt)
3665  {
3666  op2 = op2b;
3667  op2->Pt = Pt;
3668  op2b = DupOutPt(op2, !DiscardLeft);
3669  };
3670  } else
3671  {
3672  while (op2->Next->Pt.X >= Pt.X &&
3673  op2->Next->Pt.X <= op2->Pt.X && op2->Next->Pt.Y == Pt.Y)
3674  op2 = op2->Next;
3675  if (!DiscardLeft && (op2->Pt.X != Pt.X))
3676  op2 = op2->Next;
3677  op2b = DupOutPt(op2, DiscardLeft);
3678  if (op2b->Pt != Pt)
3679  {
3680  op2 = op2b;
3681  op2->Pt = Pt;
3682  op2b = DupOutPt(op2, DiscardLeft);
3683  };
3684  };
3685 
3686  if ((Dir1 == dLeftToRight) == DiscardLeft)
3687  {
3688  op1->Prev = op2;
3689  op2->Next = op1;
3690  op1b->Next = op2b;
3691  op2b->Prev = op1b;
3692  } else
3693  {
3694  op1->Next = op2;
3695  op2->Prev = op1;
3696  op1b->Prev = op2b;
3697  op2b->Next = op1b;
3698  }
3699  return true;
3700  }
3701 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3702 
3703  bool Clipper::JoinPoints(Join *j, OutRec *outRec1, OutRec *outRec2)
3704  {
3705  OutPt *op1 = j->OutPt1, *op1b;
3706  OutPt *op2 = j->OutPt2, *op2b;
3707 
3708  //There are 3 kinds of joins for output polygons ...
3709  //1. Horizontal joins where Join.OutPt1 & Join.OutPt2 are vertices anywhere
3710  //along (horizontal) collinear edges (& Join.OffPt is on the same horizontal).
3711  //2. Non-horizontal joins where Join.OutPt1 & Join.OutPt2 are at the same
3712  //location at the Bottom of the overlapping segment (& Join.OffPt is above).
3713  //3. StrictSimple joins where edges touch but are not collinear and where
3714  //Join.OutPt1, Join.OutPt2 & Join.OffPt all share the same point.
3715  bool isHorizontal = (j->OutPt1->Pt.Y == j->OffPt.Y);
3716 
3717  if (isHorizontal && (j->OffPt == j->OutPt1->Pt) &&
3718  (j->OffPt == j->OutPt2->Pt))
3719  {
3720  //Strictly Simple join ...
3721  if (outRec1 != outRec2)
3722  return false;
3723  op1b = j->OutPt1->Next;
3724  while (op1b != op1 && (op1b->Pt == j->OffPt))
3725  op1b = op1b->Next;
3726  bool reverse1 = (op1b->Pt.Y > j->OffPt.Y);
3727  op2b = j->OutPt2->Next;
3728  while (op2b != op2 && (op2b->Pt == j->OffPt))
3729  op2b = op2b->Next;
3730  bool reverse2 = (op2b->Pt.Y > j->OffPt.Y);
3731  if (reverse1 == reverse2)
3732  return false;
3733  if (reverse1)
3734  {
3735  op1b = DupOutPt(op1, false);
3736  op2b = DupOutPt(op2, true);
3737  op1->Prev = op2;
3738  op2->Next = op1;
3739  op1b->Next = op2b;
3740  op2b->Prev = op1b;
3741  j->OutPt1 = op1;
3742  j->OutPt2 = op1b;
3743  return true;
3744  } else
3745  {
3746  op1b = DupOutPt(op1, true);
3747  op2b = DupOutPt(op2, false);
3748  op1->Next = op2;
3749  op2->Prev = op1;
3750  op1b->Prev = op2b;
3751  op2b->Next = op1b;
3752  j->OutPt1 = op1;
3753  j->OutPt2 = op1b;
3754  return true;
3755  }
3756  } else if (isHorizontal)
3757  {
3758  //treat horizontal joins differently to non-horizontal joins since with
3759  //them we're not yet sure where the overlapping is. OutPt1.Pt & OutPt2.Pt
3760  //may be anywhere along the horizontal edge.
3761  op1b = op1;
3762  while (op1->Prev->Pt.Y == op1->Pt.Y && op1->Prev != op1b && op1->Prev != op2)
3763  op1 = op1->Prev;
3764  while (op1b->Next->Pt.Y == op1b->Pt.Y && op1b->Next != op1 && op1b->Next != op2)
3765  op1b = op1b->Next;
3766  if (op1b->Next == op1 || op1b->Next == op2)
3767  return false; //a flat 'polygon'
3768 
3769  op2b = op2;
3770  while (op2->Prev->Pt.Y == op2->Pt.Y && op2->Prev != op2b && op2->Prev != op1b)
3771  op2 = op2->Prev;
3772  while (op2b->Next->Pt.Y == op2b->Pt.Y && op2b->Next != op2 && op2b->Next != op1)
3773  op2b = op2b->Next;
3774  if (op2b->Next == op2 || op2b->Next == op1)
3775  return false; //a flat 'polygon'
3776 
3777  cInt Left, Right;
3778  //Op1 --> Op1b & Op2 --> Op2b are the extremites of the horizontal edges
3779  if (!GetOverlap(op1->Pt.X, op1b->Pt.X, op2->Pt.X, op2b->Pt.X, Left, Right))
3780  return false;
3781 
3782  //DiscardLeftSide: when overlapping edges are joined, a spike will created
3783  //which needs to be cleaned up. However, we don't want Op1 or Op2 caught up
3784  //on the discard Side as either may still be needed for other joins ...
3785  IntPoint Pt;
3786  bool DiscardLeftSide;
3787  if (op1->Pt.X >= Left && op1->Pt.X <= Right)
3788  {
3789  Pt = op1->Pt;
3790  DiscardLeftSide = (op1->Pt.X > op1b->Pt.X);
3791  } else if (op2->Pt.X >= Left && op2->Pt.X <= Right)
3792  {
3793  Pt = op2->Pt;
3794  DiscardLeftSide = (op2->Pt.X > op2b->Pt.X);
3795  } else if (op1b->Pt.X >= Left && op1b->Pt.X <= Right)
3796  {
3797  Pt = op1b->Pt;
3798  DiscardLeftSide = op1b->Pt.X > op1->Pt.X;
3799  } else
3800  {
3801  Pt = op2b->Pt;
3802  DiscardLeftSide = (op2b->Pt.X > op2->Pt.X);
3803  }
3804  j->OutPt1 = op1;
3805  j->OutPt2 = op2;
3806  return JoinHorz(op1, op1b, op2, op2b, Pt, DiscardLeftSide);
3807  } else
3808  {
3809  //nb: For non-horizontal joins ...
3810  // 1. Jr.OutPt1.Pt.Y == Jr.OutPt2.Pt.Y
3811  // 2. Jr.OutPt1.Pt > Jr.OffPt.Y
3812 
3813  //make sure the polygons are correctly oriented ...
3814  op1b = op1->Next;
3815  while ((op1b->Pt == op1->Pt) && (op1b != op1))
3816  op1b = op1b->Next;
3817  bool Reverse1 = ((op1b->Pt.Y > op1->Pt.Y) ||
3818  !SlopesEqual(op1->Pt, op1b->Pt, j->OffPt, m_UseFullRange));
3819  if (Reverse1)
3820  {
3821  op1b = op1->Prev;
3822  while ((op1b->Pt == op1->Pt) && (op1b != op1))
3823  op1b = op1b->Prev;
3824  if ((op1b->Pt.Y > op1->Pt.Y) ||
3825  !SlopesEqual(op1->Pt, op1b->Pt, j->OffPt, m_UseFullRange))
3826  return false;
3827  };
3828  op2b = op2->Next;
3829  while ((op2b->Pt == op2->Pt) && (op2b != op2))
3830  op2b = op2b->Next;
3831  bool Reverse2 = ((op2b->Pt.Y > op2->Pt.Y) ||
3832  !SlopesEqual(op2->Pt, op2b->Pt, j->OffPt, m_UseFullRange));
3833  if (Reverse2)
3834  {
3835  op2b = op2->Prev;
3836  while ((op2b->Pt == op2->Pt) && (op2b != op2))
3837  op2b = op2b->Prev;
3838  if ((op2b->Pt.Y > op2->Pt.Y) ||
3839  !SlopesEqual(op2->Pt, op2b->Pt, j->OffPt, m_UseFullRange))
3840  return false;
3841  }
3842 
3843  if ((op1b == op1) || (op2b == op2) || (op1b == op2b) ||
3844  ((outRec1 == outRec2) && (Reverse1 == Reverse2)))
3845  return false;
3846 
3847  if (Reverse1)
3848  {
3849  op1b = DupOutPt(op1, false);
3850  op2b = DupOutPt(op2, true);
3851  op1->Prev = op2;
3852  op2->Next = op1;
3853  op1b->Next = op2b;
3854  op2b->Prev = op1b;
3855  j->OutPt1 = op1;
3856  j->OutPt2 = op1b;
3857  return true;
3858  } else
3859  {
3860  op1b = DupOutPt(op1, true);
3861  op2b = DupOutPt(op2, false);
3862  op1->Next = op2;
3863  op2->Prev = op1;
3864  op1b->Prev = op2b;
3865  op2b->Next = op1b;
3866  j->OutPt1 = op1;
3867  j->OutPt2 = op1b;
3868  return true;
3869  }
3870  }
3871  }
3872 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
3873 
3874  static OutRec *ParseFirstLeft(OutRec *FirstLeft)
3875  {
3876  while (FirstLeft && !FirstLeft->Pts)
3877  FirstLeft = FirstLeft->FirstLeft;
3878  return FirstLeft;
3879  }
3880 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3881 
3882  void Clipper::FixupFirstLefts1(OutRec *OldOutRec, OutRec *NewOutRec)
3883  {
3884  //tests if NewOutRec contains the polygon before reassigning FirstLeft
3885  for (PolyOutList::size_type i = 0; i < m_PolyOuts.size(); ++i)
3886  {
3887  OutRec *outRec = m_PolyOuts[i];
3888  OutRec *firstLeft = ParseFirstLeft(outRec->FirstLeft);
3889  if (outRec->Pts && firstLeft == OldOutRec)
3890  {
3891  if (Poly2ContainsPoly1(outRec->Pts, NewOutRec->Pts))
3892  outRec->FirstLeft = NewOutRec;
3893  }
3894  }
3895  }
3896 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
3897 
3898  void Clipper::FixupFirstLefts2(OutRec *InnerOutRec, OutRec *OuterOutRec)
3899  {
3900  //A polygon has split into two such that one is now the inner of the other.
3901  //It's possible that these polygons now wrap around other polygons, so check
3902  //every polygon that's also contained by OuterOutRec's FirstLeft container
3903  //(including 0) to see if they've become inner to the new inner polygon ...
3904  OutRec *orfl = OuterOutRec->FirstLeft;
3905  for (PolyOutList::size_type i = 0; i < m_PolyOuts.size(); ++i)
3906  {
3907  OutRec *outRec = m_PolyOuts[i];
3908 
3909  if (!outRec->Pts || outRec == OuterOutRec || outRec == InnerOutRec)
3910  continue;
3911  OutRec *firstLeft = ParseFirstLeft(outRec->FirstLeft);
3912  if (firstLeft != orfl && firstLeft != InnerOutRec && firstLeft != OuterOutRec)
3913  continue;
3914  if (Poly2ContainsPoly1(outRec->Pts, InnerOutRec->Pts))
3915  outRec->FirstLeft = InnerOutRec;
3916  else if (Poly2ContainsPoly1(outRec->Pts, OuterOutRec->Pts))
3917  outRec->FirstLeft = OuterOutRec;
3918  else if (outRec->FirstLeft == InnerOutRec || outRec->FirstLeft == OuterOutRec)
3919  outRec->FirstLeft = orfl;
3920  }
3921  }
3922 
3923 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
3924  void Clipper::FixupFirstLefts3(OutRec *OldOutRec, OutRec *NewOutRec)
3925  {
3926  //reassigns FirstLeft WITHOUT testing if NewOutRec contains the polygon
3927  for (PolyOutList::size_type i = 0; i < m_PolyOuts.size(); ++i)
3928  {
3929  OutRec *outRec = m_PolyOuts[i];
3930  OutRec *firstLeft = ParseFirstLeft(outRec->FirstLeft);
3931  if (outRec->Pts && firstLeft == OldOutRec)
3932  outRec->FirstLeft = NewOutRec;
3933  }
3934  }
3935 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
3936 
3937  void Clipper::JoinCommonEdges()
3938  {
3939  for (JoinList::size_type i = 0; i < m_Joins.size(); i++)
3940  {
3941  Join *join = m_Joins[i];
3942 
3943  OutRec *outRec1 = GetOutRec(join->OutPt1->Idx);
3944  OutRec *outRec2 = GetOutRec(join->OutPt2->Idx);
3945 
3946  if (!outRec1->Pts || !outRec2->Pts)
3947  continue;
3948  if (outRec1->IsOpen || outRec2->IsOpen)
3949  continue;
3950 
3951  //get the polygon fragment with the correct hole state (FirstLeft)
3952  //before calling JoinPoints() ...
3953  OutRec *holeStateRec;
3954  if (outRec1 == outRec2)
3955  holeStateRec = outRec1;
3956  else if (OutRec1RightOfOutRec2(outRec1, outRec2))
3957  holeStateRec = outRec2;
3958  else if (OutRec1RightOfOutRec2(outRec2, outRec1))
3959  holeStateRec = outRec1;
3960  else
3961  holeStateRec = GetLowermostRec(outRec1, outRec2);
3962 
3963  if (!JoinPoints(join, outRec1, outRec2))
3964  continue;
3965 
3966  if (outRec1 == outRec2)
3967  {
3968  //instead of joining two polygons, we've just created a new one by
3969  //splitting one polygon into two.
3970  outRec1->Pts = join->OutPt1;
3971  outRec1->BottomPt = 0;
3972  outRec2 = CreateOutRec();
3973  outRec2->Pts = join->OutPt2;
3974 
3975  //update all OutRec2.Pts Idx's ...
3976  UpdateOutPtIdxs(*outRec2);
3977 
3978  if (Poly2ContainsPoly1(outRec2->Pts, outRec1->Pts))
3979  {
3980  //outRec1 contains outRec2 ...
3981  outRec2->IsHole = !outRec1->IsHole;
3982  outRec2->FirstLeft = outRec1;
3983 
3984  if (m_UsingPolyTree)
3985  FixupFirstLefts2(outRec2, outRec1);
3986 
3987  if ((outRec2->IsHole ^ m_ReverseOutput) == (Area(*outRec2) > 0))
3988  ReversePolyPtLinks(outRec2->Pts);
3989 
3990  } else if (Poly2ContainsPoly1(outRec1->Pts, outRec2->Pts))
3991  {
3992  //outRec2 contains outRec1 ...
3993  outRec2->IsHole = outRec1->IsHole;
3994  outRec1->IsHole = !outRec2->IsHole;
3995  outRec2->FirstLeft = outRec1->FirstLeft;
3996  outRec1->FirstLeft = outRec2;
3997 
3998  if (m_UsingPolyTree)
3999  FixupFirstLefts2(outRec1, outRec2);
4000 
4001  if ((outRec1->IsHole ^ m_ReverseOutput) == (Area(*outRec1) > 0))
4002  ReversePolyPtLinks(outRec1->Pts);
4003  } else
4004  {
4005  //the 2 polygons are completely separate ...
4006  outRec2->IsHole = outRec1->IsHole;
4007  outRec2->FirstLeft = outRec1->FirstLeft;
4008 
4009  //fixup FirstLeft pointers that may need reassigning to OutRec2
4010  if (m_UsingPolyTree)
4011  FixupFirstLefts1(outRec1, outRec2);
4012  }
4013 
4014  } else
4015  {
4016  //joined 2 polygons together ...
4017 
4018  outRec2->Pts = 0;
4019  outRec2->BottomPt = 0;
4020  outRec2->Idx = outRec1->Idx;
4021 
4022  outRec1->IsHole = holeStateRec->IsHole;
4023  if (holeStateRec == outRec2)
4024  outRec1->FirstLeft = outRec2->FirstLeft;
4025  outRec2->FirstLeft = outRec1;
4026 
4027  if (m_UsingPolyTree)
4028  FixupFirstLefts3(outRec2, outRec1);
4029  }
4030  }
4031  }
4032 
4033 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4034 // ClipperOffset support functions ...
4035 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4036 
4037  DoublePoint GetUnitNormal(const IntPoint &pt1, const IntPoint &pt2)
4038  {
4039  if (pt2.X == pt1.X && pt2.Y == pt1.Y)
4040  return DoublePoint(0, 0);
4041 
4042  double Dx = (double) (pt2.X - pt1.X);
4043  double dy = (double) (pt2.Y - pt1.Y);
4044  double f = 1 * 1.0 / std::sqrt(Dx * Dx + dy * dy);
4045  Dx *= f;
4046  dy *= f;
4047  return DoublePoint(dy, -Dx);
4048  }

4054  ClipperOffset::ClipperOffset(double miterLimit, double arcTolerance)
4055  {
4056  this->MiterLimit = miterLimit;
4057  this->ArcTolerance = arcTolerance;
4058  m_lowest.X = -1;
4059  }
4060 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4061 
4062  ClipperOffset::~ClipperOffset()
4063  {
4064  Clear();
4065  }
4066 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4067 
4068  void ClipperOffset::Clear()
4069  {
4070  for (int i = 0; i < m_polyNodes.ChildCount(); ++i)
4071  delete m_polyNodes.Childs[i];
4072  m_polyNodes.Childs.clear();
4073  m_lowest.X = -1;
4074  }
4075 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4076 
4077  void ClipperOffset::AddPath(const Path &path, JoinType joinType, EndType endType)
4078  {
4079  int highI = (int) path.size() - 1;
4080  if (highI < 0)
4081  return;
4082  PolyNode *newNode = new PolyNode();
4083  newNode->m_jointype = joinType;
4084  newNode->m_endtype = endType;
4085 
4086  //strip duplicate points from path and also get index to the lowest point ...
4087  if (endType == etClosedLine || endType == etClosedPolygon)
4088  while (highI > 0 && path[0] == path[highI])
4089  highI--;
4090  newNode->Contour.reserve(highI + 1);
4091  newNode->Contour.push_back(path[0]);
4092  int j = 0, k = 0;
4093  for (int i = 1; i <= highI; i++)
4094  if (newNode->Contour[j] != path[i])
4095  {
4096  j++;
4097  newNode->Contour.push_back(path[i]);
4098  if (path[i].Y > newNode->Contour[k].Y ||
4099  (path[i].Y == newNode->Contour[k].Y &&
4100  path[i].X < newNode->Contour[k].X))
4101  k = j;
4102  }
4103  if (endType == etClosedPolygon && j < 2)
4104  {
4105  delete newNode;
4106  return;
4107  }
4108  m_polyNodes.AddChild(*newNode);
4109 
4110  //if this path's lowest pt is lower than all the others then update m_lowest
4111  if (endType != etClosedPolygon)
4112  return;
4113  if (m_lowest.X < 0)
4114  m_lowest = IntPoint(m_polyNodes.ChildCount() - 1, k);
4115  else
4116  {
4117  IntPoint ip = m_polyNodes.Childs[(int) m_lowest.X]->Contour[(int) m_lowest.Y];
4118  if (newNode->Contour[k].Y > ip.Y ||
4119  (newNode->Contour[k].Y == ip.Y &&
4120  newNode->Contour[k].X < ip.X))
4121  m_lowest = IntPoint(m_polyNodes.ChildCount() - 1, k);
4122  }
4123  }
4124 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4125 
4126  void ClipperOffset::AddPaths(const Paths &paths, JoinType joinType, EndType endType)
4127  {
4128  for (Paths::size_type i = 0; i < paths.size(); ++i)
4129  AddPath(paths[i], joinType, endType);
4130  }
4131 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4132 
4133  void ClipperOffset::FixOrientations()
4134  {
4135  //fixup orientations of all closed paths if the orientation of the
4136  //closed path with the lowermost vertex is wrong ...
4137  if (m_lowest.X >= 0 &&
4138  !Orientation(m_polyNodes.Childs[(int) m_lowest.X]->Contour))
4139  {
4140  for (int i = 0; i < m_polyNodes.ChildCount(); ++i)
4141  {
4142  PolyNode &node = *m_polyNodes.Childs[i];
4143  if (node.m_endtype == etClosedPolygon ||
4144  (node.m_endtype == etClosedLine && Orientation(node.Contour)))
4145  ReversePath(node.Contour);
4146  }
4147  } else
4148  {
4149  for (int i = 0; i < m_polyNodes.ChildCount(); ++i)
4150  {
4151  PolyNode &node = *m_polyNodes.Childs[i];
4152  if (node.m_endtype == etClosedLine && !Orientation(node.Contour))
4153  ReversePath(node.Contour);
4154  }
4155  }
4156  }
4157 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4158 
4159  void ClipperOffset::Execute(Paths &solution, double delta)
4160  {
4161  solution.clear();
4162  FixOrientations();
4163  DoOffset(delta);
4164 
4165  //now clean up 'corners' ...
4166  Clipper clpr;
4167  clpr.AddPaths(m_destPolys, ptSubject, true);
4168  if (delta > 0)
4169  {
4170  clpr.Execute(ctUnion, solution, pftPositive, pftPositive);
4171  } else
4172  {
4173  IntRect r = clpr.GetBounds();
4174  Path outer(4);
4175  outer[0] = IntPoint(r.left - 10, r.bottom + 10);
4176  outer[1] = IntPoint(r.right + 10, r.bottom + 10);
4177  outer[2] = IntPoint(r.right + 10, r.top - 10);
4178  outer[3] = IntPoint(r.left - 10, r.top - 10);
4179 
4180  clpr.AddPath(outer, ptSubject, true);
4181  clpr.ReverseSolution(true);
4182  clpr.Execute(ctUnion, solution, pftNegative, pftNegative);
4183  if (solution.size() > 0)
4184  solution.erase(solution.begin());
4185  }
4186  }
4187 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4188 
4189  void ClipperOffset::Execute(PolyTree &solution, double delta)
4190  {
4191  solution.Clear();
4192  FixOrientations();
4193  DoOffset(delta);
4194 
4195  //now clean up 'corners' ...
4196  Clipper clpr;
4197  clpr.AddPaths(m_destPolys, ptSubject, true);
4198  if (delta > 0)
4199  {
4200  clpr.Execute(ctUnion, solution, pftPositive, pftPositive);
4201  } else
4202  {
4203  IntRect r = clpr.GetBounds();
4204  Path outer(4);
4205  outer[0] = IntPoint(r.left - 10, r.bottom + 10);
4206  outer[1] = IntPoint(r.right + 10, r.bottom + 10);
4207  outer[2] = IntPoint(r.right + 10, r.top - 10);
4208  outer[3] = IntPoint(r.left - 10, r.top - 10);
4209 
4210  clpr.AddPath(outer, ptSubject, true);
4211  clpr.ReverseSolution(true);
4212  clpr.Execute(ctUnion, solution, pftNegative, pftNegative);
4213  //remove the outer PolyNode rectangle ...
4214  if (solution.ChildCount() == 1 && solution.Childs[0]->ChildCount() > 0)
4215  {
4216  PolyNode *outerNode = solution.Childs[0];
4217  solution.Childs.reserve(outerNode->ChildCount());
4218  solution.Childs[0] = outerNode->Childs[0];
4219  solution.Childs[0]->Parent = outerNode->Parent;
4220  for (int i = 1; i < outerNode->ChildCount(); ++i)
4221  solution.AddChild(*outerNode->Childs[i]);
4222  } else
4223  solution.Clear();
4224  }
4225  }
4226 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4227 
4228  void ClipperOffset::DoOffset(double delta)
4229  {
4230  m_destPolys.clear();
4231  m_delta = delta;
4232 
4233  //if Zero offset, just copy any CLOSED polygons to m_p and return ...
4234  if (NEAR_ZERO(delta))
4235  {
4236  m_destPolys.reserve(m_polyNodes.ChildCount());
4237  for (int i = 0; i < m_polyNodes.ChildCount(); i++)
4238  {
4239  PolyNode &node = *m_polyNodes.Childs[i];
4240  if (node.m_endtype == etClosedPolygon)
4241  m_destPolys.push_back(node.Contour);
4242  }
4243  return;
4244  }
4245 
4246  //see offset_triginometry3.svg in the documentation folder ...
4247  if (MiterLimit > 2)
4248  m_miterLim = 2 / (MiterLimit * MiterLimit);
4249  else
4250  m_miterLim = 0.5;
4251 
4252  double y;
4253  if (ArcTolerance <= 0.0)
4254  y = def_arc_tolerance;
4255  else if (ArcTolerance > std::fabs(delta) * def_arc_tolerance)
4256  y = std::fabs(delta) * def_arc_tolerance;
4257  else
4258  y = ArcTolerance;
4259  //see offset_triginometry2.svg in the documentation folder ...
4260  double steps = pi / std::acos(1 - y / std::fabs(delta));
4261  if (steps > std::fabs(delta) * pi)
4262  steps = std::fabs(delta) * pi; //ie excessive precision check
4263  m_sin = std::sin(two_pi / steps);
4264  m_cos = std::cos(two_pi / steps);
4265  m_StepsPerRad = steps / two_pi;
4266  if (delta < 0.0)
4267  m_sin = -m_sin;
4268 
4269  m_destPolys.reserve(m_polyNodes.ChildCount() * 2);
4270  for (int i = 0; i < m_polyNodes.ChildCount(); i++)
4271  {
4272  PolyNode &node = *m_polyNodes.Childs[i];
4273  m_srcPoly = node.Contour;
4274 
4275  int len = (int) m_srcPoly.size();
4276  if (len == 0 || (delta <= 0 && (len < 3 || node.m_endtype != etClosedPolygon)))
4277  continue;
4278 
4279  m_destPoly.clear();
4280  if (len == 1)
4281  {
4282  if (node.m_jointype == jtRound)
4283  {
4284  double X = 1.0, Y = 0.0;
4285  for (cInt j = 1; j <= steps; j++)
4286  {
4287  m_destPoly.push_back(IntPoint(
4288  Round(m_srcPoly[0].X + X * delta),
4289  Round(m_srcPoly[0].Y + Y * delta)));
4290  double X2 = X;
4291  X = X * m_cos - m_sin * Y;
4292  Y = X2 * m_sin + Y * m_cos;
4293  }
4294  } else
4295  {
4296  double X = -1.0, Y = -1.0;
4297  for (int j = 0; j < 4; ++j)
4298  {
4299  m_destPoly.push_back(IntPoint(
4300  Round(m_srcPoly[0].X + X * delta),
4301  Round(m_srcPoly[0].Y + Y * delta)));
4302  if (X < 0)
4303  X = 1;
4304  else if (Y < 0)
4305  Y = 1;
4306  else
4307  X = -1;
4308  }
4309  }
4310  m_destPolys.push_back(m_destPoly);
4311  continue;
4312  }
4313  //build m_normals ...
4314  m_normals.clear();
4315  m_normals.reserve(len);
4316  for (int j = 0; j < len - 1; ++j)
4317  m_normals.push_back(GetUnitNormal(m_srcPoly[j], m_srcPoly[j + 1]));
4318  if (node.m_endtype == etClosedLine || node.m_endtype == etClosedPolygon)
4319  m_normals.push_back(GetUnitNormal(m_srcPoly[len - 1], m_srcPoly[0]));
4320  else
4321  m_normals.push_back(DoublePoint(m_normals[len - 2]));
4322 
4323  if (node.m_endtype == etClosedPolygon)
4324  {
4325  int k = len - 1;
4326  for (int j = 0; j < len; ++j)
4327  OffsetPoint(j, k, node.m_jointype);
4328  m_destPolys.push_back(m_destPoly);
4329  } else if (node.m_endtype == etClosedLine)
4330  {
4331  int k = len - 1;
4332  for (int j = 0; j < len; ++j)
4333  OffsetPoint(j, k, node.m_jointype);
4334  m_destPolys.push_back(m_destPoly);
4335  m_destPoly.clear();
4336  //re-build m_normals ...
4337  DoublePoint n = m_normals[len - 1];
4338  for (int j = len - 1; j > 0; j--)
4339  m_normals[j] = DoublePoint(-m_normals[j - 1].X, -m_normals[j - 1].Y);
4340  m_normals[0] = DoublePoint(-n.X, -n.Y);
4341  k = 0;
4342  for (int j = len - 1; j >= 0; j--)
4343  OffsetPoint(j, k, node.m_jointype);
4344  m_destPolys.push_back(m_destPoly);
4345  } else
4346  {
4347  int k = 0;
4348  for (int j = 1; j < len - 1; ++j)
4349  OffsetPoint(j, k, node.m_jointype);
4350 
4351  IntPoint pt1;
4352  if (node.m_endtype == etOpenButt)
4353  {
4354  int j = len - 1;
4355  pt1 = IntPoint((cInt) Round(m_srcPoly[j].X + m_normals[j].X *
4356  delta), (cInt) Round(m_srcPoly[j].Y + m_normals[j].Y * delta));
4357  m_destPoly.push_back(pt1);
4358  pt1 = IntPoint((cInt) Round(m_srcPoly[j].X - m_normals[j].X *
4359  delta), (cInt) Round(m_srcPoly[j].Y - m_normals[j].Y * delta));
4360  m_destPoly.push_back(pt1);
4361  } else
4362  {
4363  int j = len - 1;
4364  k = len - 2;
4365  m_sinA = 0;
4366  m_normals[j] = DoublePoint(-m_normals[j].X, -m_normals[j].Y);
4367  if (node.m_endtype == etOpenSquare)
4368  DoSquare(j, k);
4369  else
4370  DoRound(j, k);
4371  }
4372 
4373  //re-build m_normals ...
4374  for (int j = len - 1; j > 0; j--)
4375  m_normals[j] = DoublePoint(-m_normals[j - 1].X, -m_normals[j - 1].Y);
4376  m_normals[0] = DoublePoint(-m_normals[1].X, -m_normals[1].Y);
4377 
4378  k = len - 1;
4379  for (int j = k - 1; j > 0; --j)
4380  OffsetPoint(j, k, node.m_jointype);
4381 
4382  if (node.m_endtype == etOpenButt)
4383  {
4384  pt1 = IntPoint((cInt) Round(m_srcPoly[0].X - m_normals[0].X * delta),
4385  (cInt) Round(m_srcPoly[0].Y - m_normals[0].Y * delta));
4386  m_destPoly.push_back(pt1);
4387  pt1 = IntPoint((cInt) Round(m_srcPoly[0].X + m_normals[0].X * delta),
4388  (cInt) Round(m_srcPoly[0].Y + m_normals[0].Y * delta));
4389  m_destPoly.push_back(pt1);
4390  } else
4391  {
4392  k = 1;
4393  m_sinA = 0;
4394  if (node.m_endtype == etOpenSquare)
4395  DoSquare(0, 1);
4396  else
4397  DoRound(0, 1);
4398  }
4399  m_destPolys.push_back(m_destPoly);
4400  }
4401  }
4402  }
4403 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4404 
4405  void ClipperOffset::OffsetPoint(int j, int &k, JoinType jointype)
4406  {
4407  //cross product ...
4408  m_sinA = (m_normals[k].X * m_normals[j].Y - m_normals[j].X * m_normals[k].Y);
4409  if (std::fabs(m_sinA * m_delta) < 1.0)
4410  {
4411  //dot product ...
4412  double cosA = (m_normals[k].X * m_normals[j].X + m_normals[j].Y * m_normals[k].Y);
4413  if (cosA > 0) // angle => 0 degrees
4414  {
4415  m_destPoly.push_back(IntPoint(Round(m_srcPoly[j].X + m_normals[k].X * m_delta),
4416  Round(m_srcPoly[j].Y + m_normals[k].Y * m_delta)));
4417  return;
4418  }
4419  //else angle => 180 degrees
4420  } else if (m_sinA > 1.0)
4421  m_sinA = 1.0;
4422  else if (m_sinA < -1.0)
4423  m_sinA = -1.0;
4424 
4425  if (m_sinA * m_delta < 0)
4426  {
4427  m_destPoly.push_back(IntPoint(Round(m_srcPoly[j].X + m_normals[k].X * m_delta),
4428  Round(m_srcPoly[j].Y + m_normals[k].Y * m_delta)));
4429  m_destPoly.push_back(m_srcPoly[j]);
4430  m_destPoly.push_back(IntPoint(Round(m_srcPoly[j].X + m_normals[j].X * m_delta),
4431  Round(m_srcPoly[j].Y + m_normals[j].Y * m_delta)));
4432  } else
4433  switch (jointype)
4434  {
4435  case jtMiter:
4436  {
4437  double r = 1 + (m_normals[j].X * m_normals[k].X +
4438  m_normals[j].Y * m_normals[k].Y);
4439  if (r >= m_miterLim)
4440  DoMiter(j, k, r);
4441  else
4442  DoSquare(j, k);
4443  break;
4444  }
4445  case jtSquare:
4446  DoSquare(j, k);
4447  break;
4448  case jtRound:
4449  DoRound(j, k);
4450  break;
4451  }
4452  k = j;
4453  }
4454 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4455 
4456  void ClipperOffset::DoSquare(int j, int k)
4457  {
4458  double dx = std::tan(std::atan2(m_sinA,
4459  m_normals[k].X * m_normals[j].X + m_normals[k].Y * m_normals[j].Y) / 4);
4460  m_destPoly.push_back(IntPoint(
4461  Round(m_srcPoly[j].X + m_delta * (m_normals[k].X - m_normals[k].Y * dx)),
4462  Round(m_srcPoly[j].Y + m_delta * (m_normals[k].Y + m_normals[k].X * dx))));
4463  m_destPoly.push_back(IntPoint(
4464  Round(m_srcPoly[j].X + m_delta * (m_normals[j].X + m_normals[j].Y * dx)),
4465  Round(m_srcPoly[j].Y + m_delta * (m_normals[j].Y - m_normals[j].X * dx))));
4466  }
4467 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4468 
4469  void ClipperOffset::DoMiter(int j, int k, double r)
4470  {
4471  double q = m_delta / r;
4472  m_destPoly.push_back(IntPoint(Round(m_srcPoly[j].X + (m_normals[k].X + m_normals[j].X) * q),
4473  Round(m_srcPoly[j].Y + (m_normals[k].Y + m_normals[j].Y) * q)));
4474  }
4475 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4476 
4477  void ClipperOffset::DoRound(int j, int k)
4478  {
4479  double a = std::atan2(m_sinA,
4480  m_normals[k].X * m_normals[j].X + m_normals[k].Y * m_normals[j].Y);
4481  int steps = std::max((int) Round(m_StepsPerRad * std::fabs(a)), 1);
4482 
4483  double X = m_normals[k].X, Y = m_normals[k].Y, X2;
4484  for (int i = 0; i < steps; ++i)
4485  {
4486  m_destPoly.push_back(IntPoint(
4487  Round(m_srcPoly[j].X + X * m_delta),
4488  Round(m_srcPoly[j].Y + Y * m_delta)));
4489  X2 = X;
4490  X = X * m_cos - m_sin * Y;
4491  Y = X2 * m_sin + Y * m_cos;
4492  }
4493  m_destPoly.push_back(IntPoint(
4494  Round(m_srcPoly[j].X + m_normals[j].X * m_delta),
4495  Round(m_srcPoly[j].Y + m_normals[j].Y * m_delta)));
4496  }
4497

4500 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4501 
4502  void Clipper::DoSimplePolygons()
4503  {
4504  PolyOutList::size_type i = 0;
4505  while (i < m_PolyOuts.size())
4506  {
4507  OutRec *outrec = m_PolyOuts[i++];
4508  OutPt *op = outrec->Pts;
4509  if (!op || outrec->IsOpen)
4510  continue;
4511  do //for each Pt in Polygon until duplicate found do ...
4512  {
4513  OutPt *op2 = op->Next;
4514  while (op2 != outrec->Pts)
4515  {
4516  if ((op->Pt == op2->Pt) && op2->Next != op && op2->Prev != op)
4517  {
4518  //split the polygon into two ...
4519  OutPt *op3 = op->Prev;
4520  OutPt *op4 = op2->Prev;
4521  op->Prev = op4;
4522  op4->Next = op;
4523  op2->Prev = op3;
4524  op3->Next = op2;
4525 
4526  outrec->Pts = op;
4527  OutRec *outrec2 = CreateOutRec();
4528  outrec2->Pts = op2;
4529  UpdateOutPtIdxs(*outrec2);
4530  if (Poly2ContainsPoly1(outrec2->Pts, outrec->Pts))
4531  {
4532  //OutRec2 is contained by OutRec1 ...
4533  outrec2->IsHole = !outrec->IsHole;
4534  outrec2->FirstLeft = outrec;
4535  if (m_UsingPolyTree)
4536  FixupFirstLefts2(outrec2, outrec);
4537  } else if (Poly2ContainsPoly1(outrec->Pts, outrec2->Pts))
4538  {
4539  //OutRec1 is contained by OutRec2 ...
4540  outrec2->IsHole = outrec->IsHole;
4541  outrec->IsHole = !outrec2->IsHole;
4542  outrec2->FirstLeft = outrec->FirstLeft;
4543  outrec->FirstLeft = outrec2;
4544  if (m_UsingPolyTree)
4545  FixupFirstLefts2(outrec, outrec2);
4546  } else
4547  {
4548  //the 2 polygons are separate ...
4549  outrec2->IsHole = outrec->IsHole;
4550  outrec2->FirstLeft = outrec->FirstLeft;
4551  if (m_UsingPolyTree)
4552  FixupFirstLefts1(outrec, outrec2);
4553  }
4554  op2 = op; //ie get ready for the Next iteration
4555  }
4556  op2 = op2->Next;
4557  }
4558  op = op->Next;
4559  } while (op != outrec->Pts);
4560  }
4561  }

4600 
4601  inline double DistanceSqrd(const IntPoint &pt1, const IntPoint &pt2)
4602  {
4603  double Dx = ((double) pt1.X - pt2.X);
4604  double dy = ((double) pt1.Y - pt2.Y);
4605  return (Dx * Dx + dy * dy);
4606  }
4607 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4608 
4609  double DistanceFromLineSqrd(
4610  const IntPoint &pt, const IntPoint &ln1, const IntPoint &ln2)
4611  {
4612  //The equation of a line in general form (Ax + By + C = 0)
4613  //given 2 points (x�,y�) & (x�,y�) is ...
4614  //(y� - y�)x + (x� - x�)y + (y� - y�)x� - (x� - x�)y� = 0
4615  //A = (y� - y�); B = (x� - x�); C = (y� - y�)x� - (x� - x�)y�
4616  //perpendicular distance of point (x�,y�) = (Ax� + By� + C)/Sqrt(A� + B�)
4617  //see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perpendicular_distance
4618  double A = double(ln1.Y - ln2.Y);
4619  double B = double(ln2.X - ln1.X);
4620  double C = A * ln1.X + B * ln1.Y;
4621  C = A * pt.X + B * pt.Y - C;
4622  return (C * C) / (A * A + B * B);
4623  }
4624 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
4625 
4626  bool SlopesNearCollinear(const IntPoint &pt1,
4627  const IntPoint &pt2, const IntPoint &pt3, double distSqrd)
4628  {
4629  //this function is more accurate when the point that's geometrically
4630  //between the other 2 points is the one that's tested for distance.
4631  //ie makes it more likely to pick up 'spikes' ...
4632  if (Abs(pt1.X - pt2.X) > Abs(pt1.Y - pt2.Y))
4633  {
4634  if ((pt1.X > pt2.X) == (pt1.X < pt3.X))
4635  return DistanceFromLineSqrd(pt1, pt2, pt3) < distSqrd;
4636  else if ((pt2.X > pt1.X) == (pt2.X < pt3.X))
4637  return DistanceFromLineSqrd(pt2, pt1, pt3) < distSqrd;
4638  else
4639  return DistanceFromLineSqrd(pt3, pt1, pt2) < distSqrd;
4640  } else
4641  {
4642  if ((pt1.Y > pt2.Y) == (pt1.Y < pt3.Y))
4643  return DistanceFromLineSqrd(pt1, pt2, pt3) < distSqrd;
4644  else if ((pt2.Y > pt1.Y) == (pt2.Y < pt3.Y))
4645  return DistanceFromLineSqrd(pt2, pt1, pt3) < distSqrd;
4646  else
4647  return DistanceFromLineSqrd(pt3, pt1, pt2) < distSqrd;
4648  }
4649  }
4650 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4651 
4652  bool PointsAreClose(IntPoint pt1, IntPoint pt2, double distSqrd)
4653  {
4654  double Dx = (double) pt1.X - pt2.X;
4655  double dy = (double) pt1.Y - pt2.Y;
4656  return ((Dx * Dx) + (dy * dy) <= distSqrd);
4657  }
4658 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4659 
4660  OutPt *ExcludeOp(OutPt *op)
4661  {
4662  OutPt *result = op->Prev;
4663  result->Next = op->Next;
4664  op->Next->Prev = result;
4665  result->Idx = 0;
4666  return result;
4667  }
4668 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4669 
4670  void CleanPolygon(const Path &in_poly, Path &out_poly, double distance)
4671  {
4672  //distance = proximity in units/pixels below which vertices
4673  //will be stripped. Default ~= sqrt(2).
4674 
4675  size_t size = in_poly.size();
4676 
4677  if (size == 0)
4678  {
4679  out_poly.clear();
4680  return;
4681  }
4682 
4683  OutPt *outPts = new OutPt[size];
4684  for (size_t i = 0; i < size; ++i)
4685  {
4686  outPts[i].Pt = in_poly[i];
4687  outPts[i].Next = &outPts[(i + 1) % size];
4688  outPts[i].Next->Prev = &outPts[i];
4689  outPts[i].Idx = 0;
4690  }
4691 
4692  double distSqrd = distance * distance;
4693  OutPt *op = &outPts[0];
4694  while (op->Idx == 0 && op->Next != op->Prev)
4695  {
4696  if (PointsAreClose(op->Pt, op->Prev->Pt, distSqrd))
4697  {
4698  op = ExcludeOp(op);
4699  size--;
4700  } else if (PointsAreClose(op->Prev->Pt, op->Next->Pt, distSqrd))
4701  {
4702  ExcludeOp(op->Next);
4703  op = ExcludeOp(op);
4704  size -= 2;
4705  } else if (SlopesNearCollinear(op->Prev->Pt, op->Pt, op->Next->Pt, distSqrd))
4706  {
4707  op = ExcludeOp(op);
4708  size--;
4709  } else
4710  {
4711  op->Idx = 1;
4712  op = op->Next;
4713  }
4714  }
4715 
4716  if (size < 3)
4717  size = 0;
4718  out_poly.resize(size);
4719  for (size_t i = 0; i < size; ++i)
4720  {
4721  out_poly[i] = op->Pt;
4722  op = op->Next;
4723  }
4724  delete[] outPts;
4725  }
4726 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4727 
4728  void CleanPolygon(Path &poly, double distance)
4729  {
4730  CleanPolygon(poly, poly, distance);
4731  }

4733 
4734  void CleanPolygons(const Paths &in_polys, Paths &out_polys, double distance)
4735  {
4736  out_polys.resize(in_polys.size());
4737  for (Paths::size_type i = 0; i < in_polys.size(); ++i)
4738  CleanPolygon(in_polys[i], out_polys[i], distance);
4739  }

4747 
4748  void Minkowski(const Path &poly, const Path &path,
4749  Paths &solution, bool isSum, bool isClosed)
4750  {
4751  int delta = (isClosed ? 1 : 0);
4752  size_t polyCnt = poly.size();
4753  size_t pathCnt = path.size();
4754  Paths pp;
4755  pp.reserve(pathCnt);
4756  if (isSum)
4757  for (size_t i = 0; i < pathCnt; ++i)
4758  {
4759  Path p;
4760  p.reserve(polyCnt);
4761  for (size_t j = 0; j < poly.size(); ++j)
4762  p.push_back(IntPoint(path[i].X + poly[j].X, path[i].Y + poly[j].Y));
4763  pp.push_back(p);
4764  }
4765  else
4766  for (size_t i = 0; i < pathCnt; ++i)
4767  {
4768  Path p;
4769  p.reserve(polyCnt);
4770  for (size_t j = 0; j < poly.size(); ++j)
4771  p.push_back(IntPoint(path[i].X - poly[j].X, path[i].Y - poly[j].Y));
4772  pp.push_back(p);
4773  }
4774 
4775  solution.clear();
4776  solution.reserve((pathCnt + delta) * (polyCnt + 1));
4777  for (size_t i = 0; i < pathCnt - 1 + delta; ++i)
4778  for (size_t j = 0; j < polyCnt; ++j)
4779  {
4780  Path quad;
4781  quad.reserve(4);
4782  quad.push_back(pp[i % pathCnt][j % polyCnt]);
4783  quad.push_back(pp[(i + 1) % pathCnt][j % polyCnt]);
4784  quad.push_back(pp[(i + 1) % pathCnt][(j + 1) % polyCnt]);
4785  quad.push_back(pp[i % pathCnt][(j + 1) % polyCnt]);
4786  if (!Orientation(quad))
4787  ReversePath(quad);
4788  solution.push_back(quad);
4789  }
4790  }
4791 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4792 
4793  void MinkowskiSum(const Path &pattern, const Path &path, Paths &solution, bool pathIsClosed)
4794  {
4795  Minkowski(pattern, path, solution, true, pathIsClosed);
4796  Clipper c;
4797  c.AddPaths(solution, ptSubject, true);
4798  c.Execute(ctUnion, solution, pftNonZero, pftNonZero);
4799  }

4801 
4802  void TranslatePath(const Path &input, Path &output, const IntPoint delta)
4803  {
4804  //precondition: input != output
4805  output.resize(input.size());
4806  for (size_t i = 0; i < input.size(); ++i)
4807  output[i] = IntPoint(input[i].X + delta.X, input[i].Y + delta.Y);
4808  }

4810 
4811  void MinkowskiSum(const Path &pattern, const Paths &paths, Paths &solution, bool pathIsClosed)
4812  {
4813  Clipper c;
4814  for (size_t i = 0; i < paths.size(); ++i)
4815  {
4816  Paths tmp;
4817  Minkowski(pattern, paths[i], tmp, true, pathIsClosed);
4818  c.AddPaths(tmp, ptSubject, true);
4819  if (pathIsClosed)
4820  {
4821  Path tmp2;
4822  TranslatePath(paths[i], tmp2, pattern[0]);
4823  c.AddPath(tmp2, ptClip, true);
4824  }
4825  }
4826  c.Execute(ctUnion, solution, pftNonZero, pftNonZero);
4827  }
